job_text: ['', 'More about FIG.', 'Helping the “new economy” brands and companies scale successfully (e.g Simple Mills and Stella & Chewy’s), and', "Ability to synthesize data from multiple sources and analyze performance strategically utilizing SQL or similar gap analysis skillsetsExperience visualizing findings with a front-end visualization tool like Tableau, PowerBI, Datorama or DomoStrong Excel skills for data management; familiarity with Excel's Data Analysis ToolPakExcellent written and oral communication skillsA fast learner, highly meticulousExperience / familiarity with syndicated research sources/tools (Gfk, MRI, Simmons, Scarborough, Brandwatch, Nielsen, comScore)Experience / familiarity with digital ad effectiveness researchExperience in SAS, SPSS, R or other advanced analytics software packages a plus but not required\xa00-2 years experience in analytics at a marketing agency, or related field", "FIG is looking for a Data & Research Analyst experience using analytics tools and syndicated research platforms to extract valuable insights from large datasets. You will be tasked with transforming these data sets into compelling and actionable insights. You'll work directly with the analytics team, clients and vendors to implement measurement solutions alongside a team of media planners and strategists. The role is a good fit for an analyst who is curious by nature, looking to put ideas to the test and collaborate across teams to improve the output of the analyses- with high data quality & data management standards.", 'We believe that stories are the best way to convey information and persuade people so we have built our thoroughly modern agency to deliver on this belief. We are Storytellers for the Information Age, on a mission to raise the bar in our industry by improving the quality and effectiveness of the stories told.', 'We create and produce those stories in-house, and we distribute them across all forms of traditional and digital platforms, ensuring that we create natively to the needs of each platform and channel and always with the consumer first in our minds. We have embedded all services into our offering including media planning & buying. We have a full-service production studio. In November 2017, we completed the acquisition of technology agency Hungry.', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills', 'We do two types of work really well:', 'Alignment with agency values:', 'We pride ourselves on being a fully modern, integrated agency and can be more efficient because of the diversity of skills on our team. We believe in a model with fewer, better people.', 'Experience in SAS, SPSS, R or other advanced analytics software packages a plus but not required\xa0', 'Helping established brands renovate and reposition in a vastly changed marketing ecosystem (eg Benjamin Moore, Ketel One)', 'To learn more about FIG, please visit us at figagency.com.', 'Experience / familiarity with syndicated research sources/tools (Gfk, MRI, Simmons, Scarborough, Brandwatch, Nielsen, comScore)', "Strong Excel skills for data management; familiarity with Excel's Data Analysis ToolPak", 'Experience visualizing findings with a front-end visualization tool like Tableau, PowerBI, Datorama or Domo', '0-2 years experience in analytics at a marketing agency, or related field', 'FIG was created to be a smarter, more nimble alternative to the traditional agency model.', 'Helping the “new economy” brands and companies scale successfully (e.g Simple Mills and Stella & Chewy’s), andHelping established brands renovate and reposition in a vastly changed marketing ecosystem (eg Benjamin Moore, Ketel One)', 'Our ambition is to be the lead communications agency for the world’s most ambitious companies.', 'Ability to synthesize data from multiple sources and analyze performance strategically utilizing SQL or similar gap analysis skillsets', "Truth is the most important of our values. Truth\xa0has an edge to it - sometimes it's painful, sometimes it's beautiful.\xa0 Always it's the right thing.\xa0 For our clients, we look for the\xa0truth\xa0behind trends and try to get to the\xa0truth\xa0of a story. The truth is at the heart of everything that we do and how we treat each other, our clients and their audience.\xa0", 'We are Storytellers for the Information Age, on a mission to improve the quality and effectiveness of the stories told in the communications industry. We have a simple philosophy: for success in today’s world, a brand needs One Story and Many Voices. We are looking for someone exceptional to join our team as a Data & Research Analyst.\xa0\xa0', 'Recent accolades: AdAge Agency A List Stand Out Agency 2018 and 2019, INC 5000 (the definitive list of the fastest growing privately held companies in the US), INC Best Places to Work 2019, AdAge Best Places to Work for 3 consecutive years.\xa0', 'A fast learner, highly meticulous', 'Experience / familiarity with digital ad effectiveness research', 'Qualifications:\xa0']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Data Analyst will conduct full lifecycle business and product analyses. This will include ad-hoc and deeper analyses to provide insight into performance and areas of opportunity for the business and products. The Analyst will also create repeatable reporting and dashboards to increase data visibility and consistency throughout the company.\xa0', 'Find and munge data from primary or secondary data sources', 'Fruit Street Health is a rapidly growing telemedicine company that provides services such as an online diabetes prevention program, diabetes self-management education program, urgent care visits with a doctor, and mental health services. Our company has raised more than $25 million from more than 450 physicians who have invested in our company. Our company primarily sells to self-insured employers and health plans who want to reduce healthcare costs through the power of telemedicine. ['', 'This position requires a 4-year college/university degree at minimum, with a strong academic background.', 'Job Description', 'This is a full-time salaried position. Salary is commensurate with experience, with a starting range of $40k to $49k per year.', 'Diversity and inclusion are absolutely core to our mission, and we are committed to those values in our hiring process.', 'Job Details', 'For now this position will be remote, for obvious reasons, but you must be currently based in the New York City area and available to work at our office in the DUMBO neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York, when that becomes possible. In addition, this job is likely to eventually require travel to our conferences, which take place around the country.', 'About From Day One', 'Experience', 'Demonstrated experience and skill in managing and analyzing data is a must. This is an ideal position for someone with education or experience in one of the following: advertising and marketing data such as direct marketing; financial data such as analysis and research; or academic equivalents such as survey data, compiling study results, or similar.', 'must be currently based in the New York City area', 'The Role', 'From Day One offers a comprehensive benefits package including health insurance (including medical, dental, and vision coverage), competitive vacation policies including summer and winter breaks, and an employee stock plan.', 'NYC Applicants Only:']

Typically uses existing data platforms and tools (ERP/CRM systems, relational or SQL databases, data analysis, and visualization software) as well as Human Resources Information Systems for reporting on data and Microsoft Office applications for presenting data.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Summary', ' Support Offshore mutual fund business reporting and data management by coordinating with the International sales team, Offshore funds data providers in Europe, and Data Operations to ensure data is captured, loaded, and reported in a timely and accurate fashion.', 'Experience/Skills Required', ' Bachelor’s degree or 2-3 years related experience. Financial services industry experience preferred.  Demonstrated Microsoft Excel skills.  Familiarity with relational databases and business intelligence tools such as Business Objects or Tableau.  Strong communication and customer service capability.  Detailed oriented, possess a high degree of intellectual curiosity, and strong analytical skills.  Ability to take initiative and solve problems independently, developing fully vetted and viable solutions.  Capability to collaborate with others on projects to reach a successful and timely end goal.  Financial services industry experience preferred.', 'Description', ' Detailed oriented, possess a high degree of intellectual curiosity, and strong analytical skills.', ' Participate in new data implementation projects; prepare requirements documentation, coordinate with various groups, testing, and final integration.', ' Data Analyst', ' Financial services industry experience preferred.', ' Develop, design, and distribute sale reporting.', ' Provide analytic insight and research for inquiries from various internal teams across the organization and external clients.', ' Bachelor’s degree or 2-3 years related experience. Lead new product setups and direct product maintenance in the sales tracking system. Gain familiarity with our product suite, naming conventions, attribute standards, and reporting dependencies. Coordinate with multiple departments to ensure the information is always up to date and accurate.  Manage large suite of scheduled reporting via the business intelligence application. This will include, but is not limited to, understanding when data issues require pausing reports, proactively communicating notable data points, verifying all reports successfully distribute as scheduled, handling distribution lists, and addressing inquiries from report recipients about the data they have received.  Provide analytic insight and research for inquiries from various internal teams across the organization and external clients.  Develop, design, and distribute sale reporting.  Participate in development of the enterprise data warehouse as new business is initiated, providing expertise, user testing, and implementation of new dashboards and reporting.  Assume ownership of data work flow and quality assurance. This encompasses the various data sources used to report and analyze corporate results, product setups, data updates.  Participate in new data implementation projects; prepare requirements documentation, coordinate with various groups, testing, and final integration.  Other duties as assigned.', ' Ability to take initiative and solve problems independently, developing fully vetted and viable solutions.', ' Assume ownership of data work flow and quality assurance. This encompasses the various data sources used to report and analyze corporate results, product setups, data updates.', ' Strong communication and customer service capability.', ' Manage large suite of scheduled reporting via the business intelligence application. This will include, but is not limited to, understanding when data issues require pausing reports, proactively communicating notable data points, verifying all reports successfully distribute as scheduled, handling distribution lists, and addressing inquiries from report recipients about the data they have received.', ' Capability to collaborate with others on projects to reach a successful and timely end goal.', ' Lead new product setups and direct product maintenance in the sales tracking system. Gain familiarity with our product suite, naming conventions, attribute standards, and reporting dependencies. Coordinate with multiple departments to ensure the information is always up to date and accurate.', ' Familiarity with relational databases and business intelligence tools such as Business Objects or Tableau.', ' Other duties as assigned.', ' Demonstrated Microsoft Excel skills.']

We continue to monitor and assess before we confirm the return of each wave, paying specific attention to geography-specific trends. We have taken steps to ensure the safety of our 325,000 team members and their families, providing them with resources and support as they continue to serve the members, patients and customers who depend on us. job_title: Data Analyst, Digital Campaigns - New York
job_text: ['', ' A  natural problem solver , who is able to work independently. You are energized by the idea of working through ambiguous data to come up with an actionable answer ', ' 3+ years of experience in digital campaign analytics, ideally with a B2B publisher or advertising agency a plus', ' Experience in working with large datasets coming from multiple places', ' Building reports and dashboards to help identify audience consumption and behavioral trends that provide insights into our audience (i.e. ad performance, sponsor content consumption & topic performance, engagement, traffic)', 'Responsibilities Include', ' analytical self-starter', ' Someone who  thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented work environment and adapts quickly', ' An analytical self-starter who enjoys working with data to translate it into actionable insights, analysis and recommendations for Insider Intelligence and our advertising clients   An  organized and detail-oriented  individual with excellent time management and project management skills   Someone who is  eager to continuously learn . You’re always looking for ways to optimize and can embrace Insider’s mission: get better every day  Someone who  thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented work environment and adapts quickly  A  natural problem solver , who is able to work independently. You are energized by the idea of working through ambiguous data to come up with an actionable answer ', ' Self-motivated with the ability to multi-task and effectively manage time, as well as adapt to shifting priorities', ' organized and detail-oriented ', ' thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented work environment', ' Experience working with ESPs is preferred, knowledge of Marketo a plus', ' An analytical self-starter who enjoys working with data to translate it into actionable insights, analysis and recommendations for Insider Intelligence and our advertising clients ', ' 3+ years of experience in digital campaign analytics, ideally with a B2B publisher or advertising agency a plus  Experience interpreting, analyzing, and reporting on data trends, and making strategic and creative recommendations  Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel   Experience working with ESPs is preferred, knowledge of Marketo a plus  Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a proven ability to present analysis and results to a non-technical audience  Self-motivated with the ability to multi-task and effectively manage time, as well as adapt to shifting priorities  Experience in working with large datasets coming from multiple places  A team player with strong project management, prioritization and problem-solving skills', ' Someone who is  eager to continuously learn . You’re always looking for ways to optimize and can embrace Insider’s mission: get better every day', ' Managing weekly and monthly client tracking reports and analyzing campaign effectiveness, while ensuring accurate, clear and timely reporting', ' Experience interpreting, analyzing, and reporting on data trends, and making strategic and creative recommendations', 'The Ideal Candidate Is', ' eager to continuously learn', ' Analyzing data to identify opportunities or inefficiencies, help develop strategies and deliver insights and recommendations to increase media revenue, drive actionable business decisions and optimize campaign performance', ' to join our Sales Operations team focused on supporting the Media Solutions / Advertising portion of our business. ', ' A team player with strong project management, prioritization and problem-solving skills', ' natural problem solver', ' An  organized and detail-oriented  individual with excellent time management and project management skills ', 'Required Experience', ' excellent time management and project management skills', ' Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel ', ' Building target audience segments to execute efficient and effective ad campaigns for revenue generating programs  Managing weekly and monthly client tracking reports and analyzing campaign effectiveness, while ensuring accurate, clear and timely reporting  Track campaign performance against key performance indicators (KPIs), including but not limited to: email open rates, ad impressions, CTRs  Building reports and dashboards to help identify audience consumption and behavioral trends that provide insights into our audience (i.e. ad performance, sponsor content consumption & topic performance, engagement, traffic)  Analyzing data to identify opportunities or inefficiencies, help develop strategies and deliver insights and recommendations to increase media revenue, drive actionable business decisions and optimize campaign performance', ' Building target audience segments to execute efficient and effective ad campaigns for revenue generating programs', 'We’re hiring a ', ' Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a proven ability to present analysis and results to a non-technical audience', ' Track campaign performance against key performance indicators (KPIs), including but not limited to: email open rates, ad impressions, CTRs', ' Data Analyst, Digital Campaigns']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Core Values', 'Benefits', " Ones we actually live by Lead with integrity We operate at a high level of integrity that is deeply rooted in large ways and in small daily activities and practices. We act with honor and truthfulness in all that we do. Be supportive We achieve the best results through the combined efforts of each individual. Our culture creates an eagerness in employees to take initiative and personal interest in the people with whom they work with. Foster inclusivity We place a high value on equality and fair treatment in the workplace. All employees are treated with a high level of respect all while ensuring a safe, diverse and welcoming work environment free of any form of discrimination. Extreme ownership We own everything in our world, to an extreme degree. We are responsible for not just those tasks which we directly control, but for all those that affect whether or not our mission is successful. Trust-based culture Our executive team maintains open communication and radical transparency in all aspects of the business. We also provide an open line of communication for all employees to voice their opinions. We welcome all suggestions and improvements by team members. Be positive We are a team where positivity is contagious. We’re truly passionate about what we do and look for others who approach their work with the same energy. We're not afraid to get messy and view every challenge as an opportunity to learn and grow. We value talent and dedication just as much as we encourage creativity and passion. We also believe diversity drives innovation. We are committed to inclusion across race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We celebrate multiple approaches, and diverse points of view that drive us forward every day. If you require an accommodation in order to participate in our hiring process, please contact us to make your needs known in advance to ensure appropriate accommodations are in place. Due to COVID-19, our standard recruitment process has slightly changed. Click here to learn more about how Underground Cellar is continuing to hire during this time and what you can expect throughout the hiring and onboarding process."]

Assist and support other business analysis on ad hoc requests. Work with the peer and clients to provide the best data analysis, data maintenance, data migration, and application documentations. Provide technical expertise to validate, identify and resolve data related problems by the use of research, analysis, and initiative while adhering to department standards, guidelines, and policy must be motivated and able to work with little direct supervision across multiple organizations. Assist the team in implement and coordinate application and program change rollouts. Prepare application rollout release notes and reports. ['', 'BA or BS with relevant experience', 'Education', 'About\xa0iTalent\xa0Digital:', 'Experience creating scaled solutions and working in a scaled environment', 'Responsibilities:', 'Preferred qualifications and skills', 'Strong SQL and Tableau experienceProficient in intermediate Excel (e.g. pivot tables, Vlookups)Digital marketing backgroundExcellent written and verbal communicationProcess-orientedExperience creating scaled solutions and working in a scaled environment\xa0Detail-oriented execution-styleFast learner and self-starterComfortable with ambiguity and thrives in a fast-paced, dynamic environmentReceptive to open feedbackAbility to communicate, collaborate and work effectively on a teamProven ability to manage multiple work streams at a time with high attention to detailGeneral knowledge of the advertising industry\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication', 'Receptive to open feedback', 'A woman- and minority-owned digital consulting company, we celebrate individuals and diversity, cultivating a culture where our people can excel and lead balanced lives.\xa0Recruitment at iTalent is guided by an unwavering principle: Only hire the best. Because we have the best people, we have the privilege of working with the best clients, doing the best work, and effecting transformative change at work and in our communities.', 'About Our Client:', 'Talent Digital is seeking a Business Data Analyst to join our technology practice group. This engagement will be based in Austin, Texas, and offers the right individual an opportunity to cultivate your skills and expertise in being a core member within the Business Planning and Operations team of a cutting-edge leader in the online social media and social networking space.\xa0We are seeking someone who is highly motivated self-starter, energetic, and analytical.\xa0\xa0', 'Comfortable with ambiguity and thrives in a fast-paced, dynamic environment', 'Proven ability to manage multiple work streams at a time with high attention to detail', 'Provide operational support which includes brand category tagging & shopper/local support.Establish governance processes for maintaining consistency of advertiser support and leadership visibilityDevelop comprehensive documentation for both Business Planning and Operations and Sales LeadershipPerform audits of gaps in processes documentation across the team and develop relevant wikis or presentations as well as necessary training materialsBuild and maintain processes for collecting and communicating back out team priorities, working with cross-functional teammates to identify the most pressing informationCollaborate with reporting analysts to ensure regular reporting meets broad stakeholder needs', 'This position is a W2 role with long-term potential in Austin, Texas.', 'Business Data Analyst', 'Required qualifications and skills', 'The ideal candidate will leverage their organizational & business and analytical skills to develop a governance process and framework that addresses key stakeholder support needs: maintain consistency in advertiser support needs, identify gaps in process documentation, develop required documentation & training materials, prioritization of requests, and report development.\xa0This team will provide reporting & operational support to aid with business planning and operations for the Sales Organization (Global Business Group). The ability to effectively influence cross-functional teams in an evolving and often ambiguous environment is essential.', '\xa0Detail-oriented execution-style', '\xa0', 'Strong SQL and Tableau experience', '2+ years with operations and process experience in the digital media industry preferred', 'Build and maintain processes for collecting and communicating back out team priorities, working with cross-functional teammates to identify the most pressing information', 'General knowledge of the advertising industry\xa0', 'Proficient in intermediate Excel (e.g. pivot tables, Vlookups)', 'Provide operational support which includes brand category tagging & shopper/local support.', 'Develop comprehensive documentation for both Business Planning and Operations and Sales Leadership', 'Our client is a leader in the online social media and social networking space.\xa0\xa0Their core mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.\xa0\xa0Their platforms are being used by over 2 billion people today to stay connected, discover, share and express what matters to them.\xa0Their culture is about rewarding impact and they strongly encourage people to be bold and solve the problems they care most about.', 'Digital marketing background', 'Ability to communicate, collaborate and work effectively on a team', 'Establish governance processes for maintaining consistency of advertiser support and leadership visibility', 'Perform audits of gaps in processes documentation across the team and develop relevant wikis or presentations as well as necessary training materials', 'Process-oriented', 'Collaborate with reporting analysts to ensure regular reporting meets broad stakeholder needs', 'Fast learner and self-starter']

company: New York State Technology Enterprise Corporation (NYSTEC)
job_text: ['', 'Ability to manage and develop key relationships with colleagues and clients through collaborative thinking and a strong customer focus', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Familiarity with health information exchange and/or EHR messaging standards', 'Experience analyzing large data sets, preferably in the healthcare industry (Public Health, Facility, Payer, etc.)', 'About Us:', 'Analyze the quality of various types of healthcare data to elucidate areas of data quality improvement and to aid our clients in any data quality initiatives', 'Ability to query data using SQL and a knowledge of relational database principlesExperience analyzing large data sets, preferably in the healthcare industry (Public Health, Facility, Payer, etc.)Strong communication, documentation, critical thinking, and analytical skillsAbility to manage and develop key relationships with colleagues and clients through collaborative thinking and a strong customer focusAbility to work independently and develop solutions to complex problems as part of a strategic teamMust be proficient with Microsoft Office', 'Ability to synthesize data into client deliverables (Reports, Dashboards, etc.)', 'Strong knowledge of relational database principles', 'If you’re an effective communicator who enjoys working in complex and collaborative environments, utilizing your critical thinking and research skills to develop solutions for clients, providing support to customers, and have the required education, experience and skills, we want to hear from you.', 'Education and Experience', 'As a Data Analyst, you will collaborate with team members to conceptualize, deliver, and support our clients through today’s ever-changing landscape. NYSTEC is considered a trusted advisor, partner of choice and employer of choice. We believe every interaction is an opportunity to deliver exceptional service that empowers client success! Serving as a Data Analyst, your day-to-day role as a NYSTEC consultant will be providing analytical expertise to evaluate healthcare data across various domains and client agencies.\xa0', 'Ability to work independently and develop solutions to complex problems as part of a strategic team', 'About You:', 'NYSTEC is a non-profit technology consulting company, advising agencies, organizations, institutions, and businesses since 1996. We’re independent and vendor-neutral – so we have our clients’ best interests at heart. At NYSTEC, we know that we succeed when individuals and teams flourish personally and professionally, so our benefits and perks support this mindset. Are you ready to contribute to our engaged workforce and deliver the NYSTEC Experience?', 'Required Qualifications', 'Familiarity with clinical data (EHR, Authorizations, etc.)', 'Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future.', 'Assist New York State with high-need analyses related to COVID-19, as needed', 'Proficiency in SQL', '\xa0', 'Fluency in Python (preferably Pandas and NumPy), knowledge of non-relational databases and/or knowledge of JSON', 'Proficiency in SQLStrong knowledge of relational database principlesFluency in Python (preferably Pandas and NumPy), knowledge of non-relational databases and/or knowledge of JSONFamiliarity with national data standards such as HL7, as well as coding systems (LOINC, ICD-10, etc.)Familiarity with health information exchange and/or EHR messaging standardsFamiliarity with clinical data (EHR, Authorizations, etc.)Familiarity with plan and provider data (Claims, Enrollment, Credentialing, etc.)Familiarity with Master Data ManagementStrong proficiency in Microsoft ExcelAbility to synthesize data into client deliverables (Reports, Dashboards, etc.)', 'Learn More About NYSTEC by visiting\xa0www.nystec.com', 'Candidates must\xa0be located within our geographical regions\xa0of\xa0New York City, Albany, or Rome office. We have multiple positions at varying levels.', 'Strong communication, documentation, critical thinking, and analytical skills', 'A minimum of a bachelor’s degree with at least 1 year of related experience in data analysis is required. An equivalent combination of advanced education, training, and experience will be considered. Preference given to candidates with a graduate degree in health informatics, public health, statistics, computer science.\xa0', 'Assess policies, processes, and technical solutions that facilitate the growth of data quality initiatives to inform policy and program decision-makers', '\ufeff', "It is NYSTEC's policy to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all individuals, regardless of actual or perceived race, color, creed, religion, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions), gender identity or gender expression (including transgender status), age, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law, genetic information, military service and veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status, , or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal law and ordinances. NYSTEC is strongly committed to this policy and believes in the concept and spirit of the law.", 'Familiarity with plan and provider data (Claims, Enrollment, Credentialing, etc.)', 'Familiarity with Master Data Management', 'Preferred/Desired Qualifications', 'Analyze the quality of various types of healthcare data to elucidate areas of data quality improvement and to aid our clients in any data quality initiativesAssess policies, processes, and technical solutions that facilitate the growth of data quality initiatives to inform policy and program decision-makersAssist New York State with high-need analyses related to COVID-19, as needed', 'Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel', 'Familiarity with national data standards such as HL7, as well as coding systems (LOINC, ICD-10, etc.)', 'Ability to query data using SQL and a knowledge of relational database principles', 'About the Role:', 'Must be proficient with Microsoft Office']

other methodologies where required for on-time delivery of data quality measures and results to stakeholders', 'ASI’s Information Services division seeks an individual with strong Data Governance and Data Quality skills to join their dynamic team. This role will partner with both the business and technical owners to establish and enforce data standards across the organization. The candidate must have proven track record of maintaining and improving the data quality on large data warehouse platforms. Experience with automated monitoring and alerting techniques, as well as researching and remediation of potential issues is a must.', 'Education/Certification:', 'Create and maintain excellent working relationships across the company to resolve data questions and issues.', 'Understanding of big data platforms such as Microsoft Synapse Analytics, Amazon Redshift, Hadoop, etc.', 'Orchestrate data quality work within the Agile framework and other methodologies where required for on-time delivery of data quality measures and results to stakeholders', 'Acting as an internal consultant to the business units to help them access the data they need and provide expert guidance on challenging data questions from disparate data sources.', 'Define algorithms and techniques for detecting issues with data quality.', 'Review alerts, dashboards and reports that identify potential data issues, and evaluate and quantify business impact, and prioritize remediation actions, including required process and system changes.', 'This position will play a key role in contributing to ASI’s commitment to making data-driven decisions internally as well extending that capability to our customers. The ideal candidate will be proficient with data quality algorithms and have experience querying SQL databases.', 'Understanding of cloud-based data architecture such as Microsoft Azure or AWSUnderstanding of big data platforms such as Microsoft Synapse Analytics, Amazon Redshift, Hadoop, etc.Experience with ML, AI or other data science concepts', 'Ensure conformity with and provide guidance on MDM best practices such as single-source-of-truth, data dictionary, lineage, SLA’s, etc.', 'Understanding of cloud-based data architecture such as Microsoft Azure or AWS', '5+ years of experience in Data Quality Analysis, Data Governance and MDM, preferably in the Data Warehouse and BI context.5+ years of experience working with data scripting such as SQL, R, Python, SAS, etc.Experience with reporting tools such as Power BI, Business Objects, Tableau, etc.Experience with automated data quality processing and techniques.Understanding of Data Warehousing and ETL/ELT architecture from a consumer point of view.Ability to focus on complex data dependency details as well as maintaining an understanding of the high-level business strategyBig Data experienceHands-on experience with Agile Delivery methodologiesAbility to manage multiple projects at the same timeAbility to operate as a team player and independently', 'Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Data Science or related fields or equivalent experience.', 'Experience with reporting tools such as Power BI, Business Objects, Tableau, etc.', 'Big Data experience', 'Hands-on experience with Agile Delivery methodologies', 'Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time', 'Research and document standard definitions for key data points and publish consistently across the organization.', 'Ability to operate as a team player and independently', '5+ years of experience working with data scripting such as SQL, R, Python, SAS, etc.', 'Required Skills:\xa0\xa0']

['', 'About Cognizant', ' – Process flow modeling.', ' Proactively share ongoing point of view and perspectives.', "  Assist in creating client and/ or practice related materials (deliverables, solutions, industry best practices, standards and other knowledge artifacts) to Cognizant's knowledge management repository.Must Have SkillsGamingEmployee Status : Full Time EmployeeShift : Day JobTravel : NoJob Posting : Mar 10 2021About CognizantCognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 194 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @USJobsCognizant.Cognizant is recognized as a Military Friendly Employer and is a coalition member of the Veteran Jobs Mission. Our Cognizant Veterans Network assists Veterans in building and growing a career at Cognizant that allows them to leverage the leadership, loyalty, integrity, and commitment to excellence instilled in them through participation in military service.Cognizant is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.If you have a disability that requires a reasonable accommodation to search for a job opening or submit an application, please email CareersNA2@cognizant.com with your request and contact information.", "  Masters in Business Administration, Finance or Engineering (Preferred).ResponsibilityProblem and Scope Definition:  Support formulation of problem statement and definition of scope. – Drill down beyond the problems surface to understand root cause. – Construct problem statement including problem description. – Identify key stakeholders and construct stakeholder analysis ie how they are affected. – Contribute to project planning and effort estimation within scope. – Support the identification of risks and mitigation approaches.Requirements Gathering:  Demonstrate exceptional requirementgathering skills, leveraging clear direction from engagement management. – Support requirement gathering sessions. – Organize and sequence requirements into a user requirements document. – Write wellformed, validated requirements and manage changes. – Use appropriate tools to record, track and manage requirements.Business Analysis:  Review and analyze relevant documentation to ensure the understanding of an organizations function and capabilities.  Conduct relevant research to increase understanding in support of developing comprehensive solutions.  Logically structure recommendations and supporting data to formulate a solid, logical and understandable business case. Utilize appropriate business modeling techniques to represent and graphically depict various activities, processes and data These could include: – Business process modeling. – Process flow modeling. – Data flow modeling. – Stakeholder analysis.Engagement Delivery:  Demonstrate excellence in delivery of all solutions/recommendations, including supporting artifacts, on time and with high quality.  Deliver exceptional engagement support, including development and management of project plan(s) as needed.  Develop highquality deliverables that are “reviewready” the first time. analyze government data through exploratory analysis and communicate research findings to USAFacts’ audiencesIdeate, outline, and draft written analysis based on research, and lead content creation process where applicableConduct analysis on data from new sources as needed, and recommend additions and improvements to USAFacts dataSupport additional content needed by partners, internal teams, or stakeholdersRespond to USAFacts customer emails, and document questions, improvements, or suggestions.', 'Respond to USAFacts customer emails, and document questions, improvements, or suggestions.', 'Duration\xa0- Direct hire/FTE', 'Outgoing individual with exceptional communication and people skills', 'Duration', 'Conduct research to support USAFacts content and products; analyze government data through exploratory analysis and communicate research findings to USAFacts’ audiences', 'Location', 'Interest in public policy, government, and current events', 'Follow the news cycle and draft written content in response to major events', 'Strong attention to detail', 'USAFacts is seeking a Data Analyst to research and draft timely, relevant, and interesting content on behalf of the organization with the aim of growing the organization’s user base.\xa0This position will be responsible for following the news cycle and drafting written content in response to major events, conducting research to support USAFacts’ product suite, draft written analysis, and support additional content needed by internal teams, stakeholders, and partners. This position resides on the product team. Interested individuals should have previous research experience, be engaged in current events, and have a natural curiosity about public policy.', 'USAFacts', 'We are currently helping our client,\xa0USAFacts, with a search for a\xa0Data Editor\xa0to join their growing team.\xa0USAFacts is a non-profit, non-partisan civic initiative privately founded and funded by Steve Ballmer.\xa0The aim is to give the American public free access to comprehensive, contextual, and unbiased government data. USAFacts aggregates data on spending, revenue, and outcomes from over 70 different government sources, spanning the federal, state, and local levels. USAFacts also publishes an annual "10-K Report” modeled on the form public companies file with the SEC, as well as an Annual Report that a shareholder would receive. job_title: Jr Data Analyst / SQL Server Developer
job_text: ['', 'Work on project teams to solve business problems with technological solutions.', 'Experience with SQL Server 2014, 2016 and 2017.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, or Information Technology or equivalent combination of education and work experience.', 'Design, build and maintain SSAS cubes and data marts.', 'Possess an analytical mindset with exceptional problem-solving ability.', 'Description', 'Build strong relationships with key business stakeholders and technology partners.', 'Build skills in SSIS for data processing, retrieval and other transformation tasks.', 'Develop SQL queries for ad hoc data requests.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, or Information Technology or equivalent combination of education and work experience. Strong verbal and written communication skills, for both technical and business audiences. Functional knowledge or direct experience with data modeling and data warehousing. Proficient in Excel using advanced features such as pivot tables, vlookup, etc. Functional knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting and key performance indicators. Experience with SQL Server 2014, 2016 and 2017. Broad exposure with the SQL Server product stack, including Analysis Services (SSAS), Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS) and Power BI. T-SQL development skills for building queries for data mining and analytics. Possess an analytical mindset with exceptional problem-solving ability. Demonstrate perpetual learning and improvement. ', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills, for both technical and business audiences.', 'Create/modify reports in SSRS and Power BI.', 'Broad exposure with the SQL Server product stack, including Analysis Services (SSAS), Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS) and Power BI.', 'The Candidate Will Be Expected To', 'T-SQL development skills for building queries for data mining and analytics.', 'Demonstrate perpetual learning and improvement.', 'Work closely with our accounting team to assist with financial analysis and reporting.', 'Proficient in Excel using advanced features such as pivot tables, vlookup, etc.', 'Functional knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting and key performance indicators.', 'Functional knowledge or direct experience with data modeling and data warehousing.', 'Effectively and clearly communicate with other employees in all departments and levels of management.', 'Build strong relationships with key business stakeholders and technology partners. Effectively and clearly communicate with other employees in all departments and levels of management. Work closely with our accounting team to assist with financial analysis and reporting. Design, build and maintain SSAS cubes and data marts. Create/modify reports in SSRS and Power BI. Develop SQL queries for ad hoc data requests. Build skills in SSIS for data processing, retrieval and other transformation tasks. Work on project teams to solve business problems with technological solutions. ']

verbal and written communication skills with the ability to write concise, accurate, and readable documentation and reports.Implementation experience in a client-facing environment.Ability to work with multiple cross-functional groups, including business and technical teamsA focus on customer satisfaction and relationships.', 'Work with clients and business stakeholders to gather and document ['', 'Regular and reliable attendance and punctuality is an essential function of this position.\xa0', 'QUALIFICATIONS/REQUIREMENTS:1. College Degree preferred2. 6-12 months in an office or insurance processing environment preferred3. Good typing skills4. Microsoft applications (Excel, Word, Outlook) desired5. Ability to communicate clearly, effectively and professionally with all customers (internal and external)6. Capable of working independently as well as in a team environment.DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:1. Submit all universal life, term, annuities, simplified issue, final expense and also includes rollovers/conversions into the insurance processing system. Verify the accuracy and completeness of the application and related documents. Determine administrative requirements for New Business processing. Process and allocate all money received2. Activate policies after underwriting approval on insurance processing system, which includes policy dating, error corrections, changes, delivery requirements and drafting initial premium if necessary. Review and approve annuity and conversion applications (if applicable). Order policy pages after final check complete3. Handle applications and various documents received within our electronic imaging workflow system to prepare them for submitting and/or processing of pending business. Coordinate and maintain applications within the workflow system while processing for New Business4. Communicate with agent/agency concerning questions about application processing and administrative procedures by phone, fax and email. Maintain the pending write system for new apps, initiate application writes on application omissions or questions. Order requirements from third party vendors or other requirements as requested by the underwriter. Type Modification Forms, App. Cont. Forms, and/or Policy Amendments when changes are requested by the underwriter and/or agent5. Process withdrawn, declined or cancelled cases; order letters, complete journal entries for refund of money. Execute replacement notifications. Mail letters checks to clients6. Resolve questions, errors and system signals; calculate premiums and/or run an illustration and the ability to research rate book guidelines on all products. Cross train on other functions within New Business7. Execute replacement notification by reviewing state replacement regulations to determine individual state requirements. Send notification to other insurance/annuity company along with appropriate supporting documents (if applicable). Process 1035 exchanges and fund transfer paperwork (if applicable). Follow up on these requests with other companies.Kansas City Life Insurance Company is committed to equal employment opportunities for allindividuals regardless of race, religion, color, sex, age, national origin, disability, or geneticinformation. You’ll Do', 'Spend much of your time programming, including model development and analytics projects using R (Python for some applications if desired) in addition to regularly using spreadsheets for analysis.', 'Develop strong collaborative relationships with key stakeholders in Sales, Finance and across the company, with a specific focus on our Data Science and Forecasting teams', 'Use predictive modeling and analytics to forecast Company’s revenue, identify growth opportunities, influence business partners, and drive effective decision makingSpend much of your time programming, including model development and analytics projects using R (Python for some applications if desired) in addition to regularly using spreadsheets for analysis.Assist in developing appropriately sophisticated models for advertiser demand on timescales ranging from days to years using historical data, explicit manual input, key drivers, and seasonal trends.Develop strong collaborative relationships with key stakeholders in Sales, Finance and across the company, with a specific focus on our Data Science and Forecasting teamsPartner with Product, Engineering and Operations teams to help resolve broader business problems, create revenue growth plans, establish financial and operating targets and determine optimal resource requirementsCreate and deliver impactful presentations that tell a story focused on insights, not just dataDesign, develop & deliver robust and scalable reportingSimplify complex problems & huge data sets, to extract non-obvious insightsBe personable, approachable and able to connect with team members from a variety of backgrounds.', 'Use predictive modeling and analytics to forecast Company’s revenue, identify growth opportunities, influence Business Intelligence & Modeling: Performs data analysis and develops enterprise reporting system.', 'C&N is seeking a highly motivated and experienced professional to fill an immediate opening as a Marketing Data Analyst within any of our C&N locations.  Locations include the following Pennsylvania Counties: Bradford; Cameron; Bucks; Lycoming; McKean; Potter; Sullivan; Tioga; York or in one of the following New York Counties: Chemung; Steuben. The qualified Marketing Data Analyst develops, maintains, tracks, and optimizes the company’s data models, automation systems, reporting systems, and dashboards that support and lead business decisions.  The Marketing Data Analyst works closely with teams like Finance, IT, Operations, and senior executives to manage and optimize processes for data intake, validation, mining, modeling, and visualization.  The Marketing Data Analyst reviews and manages marketing audiences and lists for campaigns.  The Marketing Data Analyst develops enterprise reporting mechanisms and dashboard reports.']

['', "As a data analyst at Redjack, you'll be responsible for developing analytics that run on more than 50 trillion business communications per year to solve the world's biggest cyber resilience challenges. These analytics will help our team to address our clients' business resilience, cybersecurity, and digital transformation needs.", 'What you should have accomplished', 'Streaming data analysis', 'Work as part of a team, collaborate effectively, and communicate continuously.', 'Your job will be to develop cutting-edge analytics to make businesses and the government more resilient.', 'High-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)', 'Apply a variety of data analysis and machine learning techniques in cloud-based environments.', 'Your job', 'You have made a significant contribution to a software and/or analysis project that leveraged either:Streaming data analysisHigh-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)', 'Apply a variety of data analysis and machine learning techniques in cloud-based environments.Apply development best practices in everything you do, including test-driven development, continuous integration, and DevOps.Work as part of a team, collaborate effectively, and communicate continuously.Learn new technologies and grow your skills and experience. Learn from others on your team.Teach and mentor others so we can make each other better.', 'You have been building analytics and analytical software professionally for at least two years.', "You have been building analytics and analytical software professionally for at least two years.You have made a significant contribution to a software and/or analysis project that leveraged either:Streaming data analysisHigh-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)Your software projects involved regular code reviews, collaboration, and engagement with customer stakeholders.You have training as an engineering thinker: a bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", 'Well assess your skills and ensure your impact will scale with your ability. What were looking for to start:', 'Teach and mentor others so we can make each other better.', 'Your software projects involved regular code reviews, collaboration, and engagement with customer stakeholders.', ' develop cutting-edge analytics to make businesses and the government more resilient.', "You have training as an engineering thinker: a bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", 'Streaming data analysisHigh-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)', 'As a cyber resilience company, we solve security, continuity, regulatory, and efficiency problems for our customers. Youll help protect the jobs and security of millions of people while working on and advancing novel techniques in computer science. Youll be connected to everything thats happening; every developer on the team is responsible for our products quality, everyone ships production code, and everyone directly supports the mission.', 'We have multiple positions at all experience levels, so whether youre still new to the industry or youve been around a while, dont hesitate to get in touch.', 'Learn new technologies and grow your skills and experience. Learn from others on your team.', 'Your job will be to', 'Apply development best practices in everything you do, including test-driven development, continuous integration, and DevOps.', 'PM20', "We are looking for people who share our core values of heroism, audacity, curiosity, and excellence to join our team. We are a tight-knit group of engineers, analysts, and business professionals who have organically built a company that monitors more than 8% of the Internets public IP space and 40 trillion business communications per year. We've had a huge impact on the Fortune-50 and Government sectors over the past year, so we're looking to grow rapidly while maintaining our culture and diversity."]

Candidates need to live within the territory or within commuting distance to Nashville, Tennessee.\xa0', 'It is the policy of Philips to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities to all colleagues and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, pregnancy/childbirth, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or perceived disability, genetic information, citizenship, veteran or military status or a person’s relationship or association with a protected veteran, including spouses and other family members, marital or domestic partner status, or any other category protected by federal, state and/or local laws.', 'Great attitude, enthusiasm, and high energy', 'Excellent interpersonal skills with ability to interact effectively at all department and organizational levels', 'Equal Employment and Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veteran', "Bachelor's Degree in business or related field, required", 'To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience', 'ontact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.', 'Why should you join Philips Global Business Services?', 'In this role, you will have the opportunity to', 'Ability to consistently meet and exceed goals; set priorities, and deliver results on time', 'If you are a Colorado resident and this role is a field-based or remote role, you may be eligible to receive additional information about the compensation and benefits for this role, which we will provide upon request.\xa0 You may contact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.', 'Additionally, we offer you the ability to partner with, learn and grow from colleagues in a highly complex, global organization where you can use your strengths to help drive a strategic business for Philips. We will support your personal and professional development with the opportunity to further advance your career in a company that believes in offering its employees challenges and opportunities to grow professionally and personally.', '3+ years of solid analytical/problem-solving skills.', 'Analyzing business needs, identify problems, propose and track solutions for alignment with desired \xa0outcomes and present findings', 'Strong project management skills with proven track-record of performance and in leading teams.', 'A vastly dynamic organization and growing team, where you will be the go-to person for data and business analytics, providing key analytic insight, data and strategic input to develop tools and processes to improve functions associated with customer satisfaction, compliance, manpower planning, financial and operational planning and trends related to tasks associated with direct growth of the business.', 'You are part of', 'Lean expertise with continuous improvement mindset, bonus', 'Applying analytical skills to business requests (which are often high-level or lacking in detail) and communicate these business wants/needs in a clear and unambiguous manner.', 'The opportunity to personally contribute to Philips’ achievement of growth objectives and the ambition of improving the lives of 3 Billion people a year by 2025. It is a calling to make life better for people through your meaningful work, focused on positively impacting 3 billion lives a year by 2030. ['', ' Researches law enforcement crime data techniques, best practices, and new developments.', ' Develops and recommends standard Department metrics procedures and methods to support on-going crime data reporting and analysis; proposes standard operating procedures based on data.', ' Responds to ad hoc requests for reports and/or analysis to help police personnel identify, define, and solve specific problems.', 'Description', ' Analyzes telephone records; tabulates and categorizes call activity by caller/recipient, geography, and demographics; completes cross tabulation of data to show relationships and trends.', ' Researches special projects for administration as needed.', ' Ability to do research methods and techniques; descriptive statistics; multivariate statistical methods; data mining; types of crimes and modus operandi associated with gang-related crime, drug-related crime, and white-collar crime; and requirements for intelligence file creation, retention, dissemination, and purging.', ' Ability to perform occasional overtime work and be available to flex hours to report to work early and/or stay late, to include holidays and weekends.', ' Composes concise but comprehensive reports of findings, employing tables, charts, maps, and graphs to present data.', ' Obtains feedback from Police Department personnel concerning preliminary findings and analysis.', ' Performs other work as assigned.', ' Uses GIS or similar mapping software to map crime incidence, police activity, and related data.', ' Compiles data to create patrol maps and crash maps; evaluates and interprets information; selects essential elements, correlates new information with existing information, identifies trends, patterns, and other relationships among data points.', ' Maintains confidentiality about information learned on the job and has the ability to deal with sensitive information.', ' Compiles crime, police activity, demographic, and related information from various records or existing databases within or external to the Police Department.', 'Essential Functions', ' Compiles crime, police activity, demographic, and related information from various records or existing databases within or external to the Police Department. Prepares descriptive statistics of data; analyzes data using cross tabs, correlation, or other multivariate statistical techniques. Uses GIS or similar mapping software to map crime incidence, police activity, and related data. Compiles data to create patrol maps and crash maps; evaluates and interprets information; selects essential elements, correlates new information with existing information, identifies trends, patterns, and other relationships among data points. Obtains feedback from Police Department personnel concerning preliminary findings and analysis. Composes concise but comprehensive reports of findings, employing tables, charts, maps, and graphs to present data. Analyzes telephone records; tabulates and categorizes call activity by caller/recipient, geography, and demographics; completes cross tabulation of data to show relationships and trends. Develops and recommends standard Department metrics procedures and methods to support on-going crime data reporting and analysis; proposes standard operating procedures based on data. Responds to ad hoc requests for reports and/or analysis to help police personnel identify, define, and solve specific problems. Researches law enforcement crime data techniques, best practices, and new developments. Confers with County crime data analysts. Researches special projects for administration as needed. Ability to do research methods and techniques; descriptive statistics; multivariate statistical methods; data mining; types of crimes and modus operandi associated with gang-related crime, drug-related crime, and white-collar crime; and requirements for intelligence file creation, retention, dissemination, and purging. Develops and maintains liaison with the intelligence community at Federal, State, County, and Municipal levels to share information on criminal activities or suspected criminals under investigation. Ability to perform occasional overtime work and be available to flex hours to report to work early and/or stay late, to include holidays and weekends. Maintains confidentiality about information learned on the job and has the ability to deal with sensitive information. Performs other work as assigned.', ' Prepares descriptive statistics of data; analyzes data using cross tabs, correlation, or other multivariate statistical techniques.', ' Develops and maintains liaison with the intelligence community at Federal, State, County, and Municipal levels to share information on criminal activities or suspected criminals under investigation.', ' Confers with County crime data analysts.']

['', 'Essential Duties/Responsibilities', 'Other Required Experience/Qualifications', '*Please note: The ideal candidate will have a mechanical aptitude and/or a maintenance or purchasing background. They also need to be comfortable with computers, ideally SAP. Weekend and OT work is expected, especially when the project goes live. Please make sure your candidate is 100% OK with this. Shift: 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Will overtime be possible (Y/N): Yes, expected OT as needed. Will weekend work be possible (Y/N): Yes, 8AM - 4:30PM as needed. Work Environment: Production Dress Code/Required PPE: Long pants (jeans), steel toe shoes, Essential Duties/Responsibilities: Essential function will be to Set up new parts in SAP. Work with vendors on quoting items. Manage master data of all packaging, ingredient, and MRO items for the facility. This will include walking down parts and physically assessing the part and making data recommendations to best suit the plants needs. Work with minimal supervision while meeting strict deadlines. Provide status updates to the master data team and materials managers. Minimum Education Required: High School Diploma Other Required Experience/Qualifications: Ability to lift up to 50 lbs., ability to use measuring tools such as measuring tape, calibers, is unassisted. Work in a fast paced environment and having a sense of urgency for needed items. Must be detail oriented. Additional Preferred Experience/Qualifications: Maintenance background or SAP experience is a plus. Ability to be resourceful on gathering data. Highly able to utilize a computer and essential applications such as Microsoft Office Applications.SDL2019-1032', 'Additional Preferred Experience/Qualifications', 'Job Requirements', 'Description', 'Please note: The ideal candidate will have a mechanical aptitude and/or a maintenance or purchasing background. ['', 'You will define a process to triage and prioritize analytics requests from across the organization', 'We are seeking an all-star\xa0Lead Data Analyst\xa0to join our growing Analytics team. You will be responsible for analytics needs across the organization, working with teams\xa0and leadership to define and shape self-service\xa0analytics and a data-driven organization.\xa0You’ll also help establish the relationship between the Analytics team and the rest of the organization, empowering team members to reach out and request analytical support as they need it. If you are a self-starter, excited about building a data-driven culture, and motivated by making an impact, then you may be a good fit for this role.', 'An extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration', 'You will work with leads across the company to define analytics requirementsYou will develop dashboards for teams across the org to support key business decisionsYou will define business metrics and maintain a data dictionaryYou will work with Business Intelligence Engineers to model data in a scalable wayYou will define a process to triage and prioritize analytics requests from across the organizationYou have exceptional data storytelling abilities, as well as the ability to articulate technical information to a non-technical audienceYou have inherent curiosity, skepticism, and analytical follow-through - you can’t help but ask “why?” and love using data and logic to explore potential solutionsYou are a self-starter with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and identify opportunities with limited oversightYou have experience with designing self-service analyticsYou have experience in statistics (e.g. hypothesis testing, regressions, experimentation logic, and biases)You have high proficiency with SQLYou have experience managing a modern BI tool like Looker or TableauYou have experience developing and documenting data modelsYou are a team player with excellent collaboration and communication skills6+ years of analytics experience', 'Attentive is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We’re committed to diversity and maintaining a work environment that is free from harassment and discrimination. We’re committed to them because our core values demand it - values like Integrity First, Listening & Cultivating Discussion, and Default to Action. We believe in embracing “self” and that our true strength lies in the diversity of our employees. For this reason, applicants from all backgrounds are encouraged to apply, and will not be discriminated against on the basis of any protected status under federal, state, or local law.', 'You will work with leads across the company to define analytics requirements', 'You @ Attentive:', 'Daily lunch delivery credit and other goodies sent to home', 'Regular company-wide social events (even virtually!)', 'Nice to have:', 'We work with 2,000+ of the most innovative brands like Sephora, Coach, Urban Outfitters, CB2, PacSun, Lulus, and Jack in the Box. Attentive was founded in 2016 by the co-founders of TapCommerce, a mobile marketing platform that was acquired by Twitter in 2014.', 'You will develop dashboards for teams across the org to support key business decisions', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental, and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursementFull support for remote work during COVID-19Daily lunch delivery credit and other goodies sent to homeRegular company-wide social events (even virtually!)Generous annual education stipend toward job-related external learning opportunitiesAn extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration', 'You have experience in statistics (e.g. hypothesis testing, regressions, experimentation logic, and biases)', 'You have experience managing a modern BI tool like Looker or Tableau', 'You have high proficiency with SQL', 'You have inherent curiosity, skepticism, and analytical follow-through - you can’t help but ask “why?” and love using data and logic to explore potential solutions', 'You have experience with designing self-service analytics', 'Attentive is a personalized text messaging platform changing the way consumers interact with businesses and organizations. The company is one of the fastest-growing startups in New York City and recently raised a $230 million investment led by Coatue in September 2020, just 5 months after its Series C round due to strong customer traction. Other investors in Attentive include Bain Capital Ventures, Sequoia, IVP.\xa0\xa0', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental, and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursement', 'You have experience developing and documenting data models', 'You have experience managing small teams and/or projects', 'You will work with Business Intelligence Engineers to model data in a scalable way', 'You are a self-starter with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and identify opportunities with limited oversight', 'You will define business metrics and maintain a data dictionary', 'Full support for remote work during COVID-19', 'You are a team player with excellent collaboration and communication skills', 'You have exceptional data storytelling abilities, as well as the ability to articulate technical information to a non-technical audience', 'Benefits & Perks:', 'Generous annual education stipend toward job-related external learning opportunities', '6+ years of analytics experience']

['', 'EEO is the Law', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.']

job_title: Entry Level Data Engineer Analyst / Python Developer
job_text: ['', 'Experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and/or artificial neural networks. ', 'Experience with Tensorflow, Theano or Keras. ', 'Experience with command-line scripting, data structures and algorithms and ability to work in a Linux environment, processing large amounts of data in a cloud environment. ', 'Availability to travel and live in the U.S.', 'Experience with command-line scripting, data structures and algorithms and ability to work in a Linux environment, processing large amounts of data in a cloud environment. Experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and/or artificial neural networks. Proficiency in applying various mathematical and statistical models to include, but not limited to: discrete event simulation, factor analysis, genetic algorithms, Bayesian probability models, hidden Markov models, sensitivity analysis, sampling, probability, multivariate data analysis, regression, PCA, time-series analysis. Broad understanding of databases (e.g. SQL, NoSQL, Lucene, Mongo), and high-performance or distributed processing (e.g. using MapReduce, Spark, Pig, and/or Hive). Experience with visualization software (Tableau, D3, MicroStrategy, PowerBI).\u202f Experience delivering solutions in an Agile environment. Experience with Tensorflow, Theano or Keras. Portfolio of public & private data science projects you’re proud of (GitHub, Kaggle, DrivenData, etc.) Publications in peer-reviewed journals. Other programming languages such as Scala, Java, R Benefits & Perks', 'Ability to work across multiple engagements with clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using structured problem solving and communication to both technical and non-technical audiences. ', "Master's degree from an accredited college/university in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Econometrics, or related fields, PhD is preferred. Alternatively, Bachelor’s Degree with at least 2 years’ experience as a Data Analyst, Data Scientist, or Research Assistant. Strong Proficiency in Python or Java programming language, or expertise with functional/object-oriented programming. Ability to translate objectives to a project plan with milestones, and resource/technology requirements, and teach, lead, and manage projects/people/clients to successful execution. Ability to work across multiple engagements with clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using structured problem solving and communication to both technical and non-technical audiences. Availability to travel and live in the U.S.Bonus points: ", 'Strong Proficiency in Python or Java programming language, or expertise with functional/object-oriented programming. ['', '2.\tFamiliarity with other Power Platform products and services', '3.\tFamiliarity with the full Microsoft BI Stack (e.g. Azure SQL)', '5.\tKnowledge with Data Science projects - a plus', 'If selected, you will be joining this cutting-edge reporting team and help drive the development of these reports and deliver them to literally hundreds of global enterprises. As such, high degree of accuracy, development efficiency, usability and speed are critical to the success of this engagement. ', '1.\tPrior experience on a Microsoft engagement or as an FTE', '4.\tReport design skills – focus on usability, performance, and security.', '8.\tMust be able to compile reports, training documentation and executive presentations,', '6.\tReport project lifecycle experience - from Design and architecture to change management.', '1.\tMinimum 4-6 years of Power BI experience', 'Desirable: ', 'Qualifications:', 'Launch Consulting Group is embedded in the development and support of the WpA service. Our teams provide a wide range of activities to Microsoft. We apply data science and AI to compile the workplace patterns data, we develop unique privacy and information protection capabilities, and we are leading the development of the Power BI reports by which businesses examine their own information. You can review some of these reports here: https://aka.ms/wpa-demos-pbi', '7.\tMust be able to collaborate with different teams. ', '3.\tStrong Power Query ‘M’ experience', '2.\tVery strong knowledge of DAX', 'You will leverage existing best practices and develop new techniques to accelerate and standardize report development. You will be involved in long term planning and developing a technical roadmap of the service as new capabilities become available in the Power BI product as well as in the WpA service. You will be responsible for surfacing technical limitations and possible work-around to the Microsoft team. You will also be accountable for the quality of the reports and be able to troubleshoot inconsistencies that may arise as a result of customer escalations. ', '5.\tExperience with ingesting multiple data sources and advance data modeling ', '4.\tKnowledge of working with Workplace Analytics – a plus', 'Today’s work environment is changing rapidly. Successful businesses depend on optimizing the collaboration between groups and helping employees manage their work-life-balance. Office 365 Workplace Analytics (WpA) service (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/business/workplace-analytics) allows enterprise customers to monitor work patterns across their organization and take action to influence productivity and prevent erosion of its workforce in the digital age. ', 'As a senior member of the reporting team you will quickly become one of the main liaisons between the business owners who draw up the general requirements for the reports, the back end data teams who identify the source of the information needed, and the report development team who design the reports and test them for accuracy and performance. ', '6.\tKnowledge with Power BI online and Power BI embedded – a plus', 'Senior Data Analyst/ Architect/ Designer - Microsoft Workplace Analytics Team', 'Senior Data Engineer/Architect']

job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities', ' Commit to collaborate. Be a strong team player and business partner cross functionally. Understand the development goals, strengths and motivators of your colleagues and partner to achieve mutual success and continuous improvement as well as professional development. ', ' Ability to adapt and thrive in fast paced, changing environment ', ' Analyzes and interprets results, of laboratory-based studies. ', ' Create data tools for analytics and metric boards to track progress ', ' Experience with high-volume data entry is a plus ', ' Strong organizational skills ', ' Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery etc. ', ' Experience working in the pharmaceutical industry or other regulated industry a plus ', '  Compiling, capturing, trending, and analyzing process generated data and subsequently using these findings to drive increased process understanding and consistency, develop improvements, or identify root cause  ', ' Preferred: Experience in regulatory inspections of manufacturing facilities ', ' Solid understanding of Good Documentation Practices (GDP) ', ' Preferred: Experience and knowledge of regulatory filings ', ' Proficiency in Microsoft Excel ', ' Strong organizational skills', ' Prepare detailed oral or written summaries of results with interpretation for projects/platform ', ' Executes and verifies data analysis in support of CPV type programs.
