Ability to show a track record of solving large, complex problems   Ability to adapt and thrive in fast paced, changing environment   Preferred: Experimental design/QbD.   Preferred: Experience in cell and gene therapy or viral vector production   Preferred: Experience and knowledge of regulatory filings   Preferred: Experience in regulatory inspections of manufacturing facilities   Proficiency in Microsoft Excel   Strong organizational skills', '  Works with process engineers and scientists to execute data analysis and application in support of late stage process development, technical troubleshooting, process monitoring, and optimization/improvement activities for manufacturing.   Supports process technology transfer with ongoing data analysis of process performance.   Executes and verifies data analysis in support of CPV type programs.   Maintain process information, documentation of process parameters, and tracking of process performance.   Analyzes and interprets results, of laboratory-based studies.   Performs data verification exercises as needed.   Prepare detailed oral or written summaries of results with interpretation for projects/platform   Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery etc.   Create data tools for analytics and metric boards to track progress   Manage individual performance to achieve business goals and objectives, as well ongoing professional development.  Manage performance: know what is expected, what it takes to be successful, and self-monitor progress. Be accountable to achieve results while demonstrating the Spark Values. Periodically review individual objectives to ensure alignment to corporate and functional objectives, making adjustments if priorities have shifted.   Commit to collaborate. Be a strong team player and business partner cross functionally. Understand the development goals, strengths and motivators of your colleagues and partner to achieve mutual success and continuous improvement as well as professional development.     Foster Spark’s Culture, Mission, Vision, and Values: Lead by example. Create an environment where team members thrive in our Culture by living our truths, always in compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Emphasize to employees that “how” they achieve performance objectives is just as important as “what” they accomplish. ['', ' Collaborate with a team of Business Analysts and provide direction of requirements management to other team members to ensure a well-trained and qualified staff. Provide Initiative insight and perspective into analysis, design, and preparation of new process and/or technology solutions to solve complex business problems. Participate in project deliverables such as Process Maps, Business Requirements, Business Rules, Use Cases and Features/User Stories. Ensure traceability throughout the delivery lifecycle. Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills performing detailed analysis of business processes and goals. Penchant to understand “How” and ask “Why” in order to seek to understand complex business issues and objectives. Support Business SME’s in analyzing, documenting and validating process and application changes. Document and/or Enhance existing requirements and use cases to account for changes in core solutions and assist with revising test cases that would be leveraged by Testing teams Extensive background in backlog management including planning, refinement and estimation Strong work ethic; self-starter and motivator; strong sense of ownership. By melding workforce, customer and operational transformation, they are one of the world’s leading consulting groups, with 65+ offices around the globe. They break new ground today so tomorrow is easier to explore.For more information, visit northhighland.com and connect with us on LinkedIn , Twitter and Facebook .North Highland is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO)/Affirmative Action employer. ['', 'Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets.', 'Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques, and provide ongoing reports Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics, and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets. Filter and “clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems. Work with management to prioritize business and information needs. Receive a robust benefits package that includes Employee Stock Ownership Plan! Enjoy flexibility managing your work hours and personal needs with a single accrual leave plan. ', 'Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (e.g. Business Objects), databases (e.g. SQL), programming (e.g. XML, JavaScript, or ETL frameworks). Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (e.g. Excel, SPSS, SAS).', 'Working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst.', 'Work with management to prioritize business and information needs.', 'Essential Requirements', 'Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics, and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.', 'Receive a robust benefits package that includes Employee Stock Ownership Plan!', 'You will help interpret data and analyze results using statistical techniques. Therefore you can expect to develop and implement data analyses, data collection systems, and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.', 'Our customers generate a lot of data throughout a typical day. Other amenities feature the 30,000 sq. ft. tranquil Mandara Spa, on-property movie theater, the award-winning 18-hole Tom Weiskopf designed golf course and renowned Atlantis Casino.\xa0Also known as the culinary destination in the Caribbean, the resort boasts a collection of 40 restaurants, many helmed by renowned chefs.\xa0', 'Atlantis. Bahamas At Heart.', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative discipline or related field (Statistics, Computer Science, Operations Research)', 'The Sales & Marketing Analytics Sr Analyst will be responsible for extracting, dissecting and managing data on build, seasonal booking patterns, growth markets, new consumer insights and opportunities across sales, marketing & consumer behaviors. ["Temporary role will involve extracting data from services and employment contracts, as well as invoices, into a spreadsheet for subsequent importation into Cobblestone contract management system. Applicant must have excellent attention to detail, be able to read and understand contracts, and quality check work before submission. Experience with excel necessary for execution of tasks and ability to communicate issues or questions clearly.\xa0\xa0Be a part of the ConsultNet difference. As a leading national provider of IT staffing and solutions, ConsultNet delivers exceptional services to startup, midmarket and Fortune 1000 companies across North America. Since 1996, we've partnered with clients to create rewarding opportunities for our consultants, successfully building teams that have surefire results. In the past two years alone, we have placed more than 1,500 consultants in contract, contract-to-hire, or direct placement opportunities. We understand communication is key to finding the right job that matches your skills and career goals. For us, it's not just the work that we do; it's how we do the work. Our breadth of offerings extends to multiple IT positions in major markets throughout the country, see more at www.consultnet.com"]

job_text: ['', 'Guardant Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', ' Proficiency in Python, as well as some experience with distributed, high-performance computing Linux environments', 'Company Description', 'Preferred', ' Experience with SQL database construction and management Knowledge of documentation best practices in a regulated environment Experience with AWS', 'This role is available to work in Seattle, WA or Redwood City, CA.', ' Knowledge of computational tools for genomics work', ' PhD in bioinformatics, computational biology, genomics (cancer genomics a plus) or related fields', ' Experience with AWS', ' Expertise in next-generation sequencing data generation and processing - ['', 'Responsibilities', ' Contributes to high level conceptual thinking and conducts operational data analyses to develop actionable information in the form of recommendations, conclusions and possible solutions to root cause analyses. Produces high level ad-hoc and standard reports to evaluate operational efficiencies and effectiveness.  Develop, implement and maintain reporting and analytical solutions for operations team. Provides leadership in defining business-critical metrics and analyses that drive the business forward. Support operations with knowledge and tools to improve the quality, efficiency and speed of information delivery and enhancements. Partners with database administrators to ensure that the databases feeding the reports are tuned for optimal performance. Manage a team of Operations Data Analyst(s). job_title: IT Support Specialist and Data Integration Analyst
job_text: ['', "Bachelor's degree in Management Information Systems, Business IT Management, or a related field from an accredited university and/or equivalent work experience", 'The IT Support Specialist / Data Integration Analyst position provides you the opportunity to apply your skills in a dynamic work environment while developing well-rounded competencies in infrastructure, support services and data integrations.\xa0Responsibilities include execution and monitoring of data flow processes between clients, carriers, third-party administrators, and service providers to support the organization’s needs.\xa0Additional tasks include being involved with administering and maintaining corporate infrastructure, including desktop support, network connectivity, Internet access, email, etc.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience with T-SQL or other query languages', 'Execution and monitoring of mission critical ETL processesPerform data analysis on many sources to determine accuracy of production recordsAnalyze data discrepancies and facilitate corrections based on resultsParticipate in ETL system and integration testingConfigure and maintain computer stations and software according to standardsRespond to employee reported hardware, software, and connectivity issues via ticketing systemManage inventory of software licenses, hardware, and other IT supplies', 'Participate in ETL system and integration testing', 'Execution and monitoring of mission critical ETL processes', 'Analyze data discrepancies and facilitate corrections based on results', 'Perform data analysis on many sources to determine accuracy of production records', 'Requirements and Qualifications:', 'Manage inventory of software licenses, hardware, and other IT supplies', "2+ years' experience in a similar position", 'Risk Strategies is a growth focused, privately-held, National Specialty Insurance Brokerage and Risk Management Advisor. We successfully assist organizations and individuals simplify the process of protecting assets, offering benefits and minimizing liability. With over 110 offices across the country & Canada, we thrive on our passion to be ranked a Best Places to Work since 2018 by our most important asset, our employees. For 2020, Risk Strategies was named 6th Fastest Growing Firm, 12th Largest Personal Lines Broker, 11th largest privately-held P&C Broker and the 16th largest US Broker by Insurance Journal.', '\xa0', 'Respond to employee reported hardware, software, and connectivity issues via ticketing system', 'Role and Responsibilities:', 'An understanding of relation database design or data modeling principles a plus', 'Risk Strategies is proud to be Private Equity backed by one of the oldest and most established firms in the private equity industry and a leading investor in the insurance sector. As an Employer of Choice, we offer a competitive compensation and benefits package and an exciting, challenging career opportunity to over 2,400 employees currently.', "Bachelor's degree in Management Information Systems, Business IT Management, or a related field from an accredited university and/or equivalent work experience2+ years' experience in a similar positionExperience with T-SQL or other query languagesAn understanding of relation database design or data modeling principles a plusData analysis and reporting experienceUnderstand the issues involved with administering and maintaining corporate infrastructure, including desktop support, network connectivity, Internet access, email, etc.Advanced computer hardware knowledge, troubleshooting and problem resolution", 'Data analysis and reporting experience', 'Configure and maintain computer stations and software according to standards', 'Advanced computer hardware knowledge, troubleshooting and problem resolution', 'Understand the issues involved with administering and maintaining corporate infrastructure, including desktop support, network connectivity, Internet access, email, etc.']

['', 'Send an email to\xa0jobs@relevant.healthcare\xa0with the subject line "Senior Health Center Data Analyst." When responding, include a resume and a note in the body of the email explaining your interest in the position. Please also include the phrase "hyena pesto" in your note, so that we know you read this.', 'Please also include the phrase "hyena pesto" in your note, so that we know you read this.', 'How to Apply', 'Join a\xa0small team of people\xa0(currently, there are 27 of us) who love what we do and continually strive to delight our customers.', 'Lead new health center implementations. ', 'Help us build the best possible analytics platform. ', 'Provide analytics support to our health centers. ', "Help us build a company culture that's friendly, respectful, and encourages continual learning.", 'Relevant’s mission is to support community health centers in their drive to improve patient health. We do this by providing smart, friendly analytics software, along with hands-on support and consulting to help health centers tackle all kinds of data challenges.', "We're committed to building a diverse company. Applicants who identify with groups that are under-represented in the technology industry are strongly encouraged to apply.", 'Preferred qualifications', 'Some experience with scripting languages such as Python or Ruby, or a desire and aptitude to learn.', "Excel wizardry. For example, we'd love for you to know everything there is to know about Pivot Tables.", 'Main responsibilities', 'Be nice, and value collaboration.', 'Knowledge and interest in the landscape of healthcare quality improvement and population health management.', "Lead new health center implementations. Conduct stakeholder meetings; develop a detailed understanding of customer business processes; extract, clean, and analyze EHR data; write lots of SQL… and get folks excited about collaborating with Relevant!Provide analytics support to our health centers. Ensure that our platform is being used as effectively as possible to improve patient outcomes and health center operations. Conceive, manage, and execute data initiatives for health centers; build reports and data visualizations as required; lead regular stakeholder meetings; provide advanced training and technical assistance to health center data teams.Help us build the best possible analytics platform. Identify improvements and new features for our platform based on feedback you've gleaned from customers, market research, insight into industry best practices, and your own domain expertise.", 'Working at Relevant', "3+ years' experience extracting clinical, operational, and financial data from electronic health record systems. A track record of successfully navigating messy database schemas and organizational politics to produce analytics that drive organizational change is a big plus.", 'Ability to write complex SQL queries. We’re looking for comfort with concepts like subqueries, temp tables, and window functions.', 'Thorough knowledge of a BI platform such as Tableau, Qlik, Cognos, or Crystal.', 'Competitive salary, excellent benefits (we pay 100% of employee healthcare premiums), 401(k) with employer contribution, generous vacation policy, and a general emphasis on happiness and sanity.', "Help us build the best possible analytics platform. Identify improvements and new features for our platform based on feedback you've gleaned from customers, market research, insight into industry best practices, and your own domain expertise.", "3+ years' experience extracting clinical, operational, and financial data from electronic health record systems. A track record of successfully navigating messy database schemas and organizational politics to produce analytics that drive organizational change is a big plus.Ability to write complex SQL queries. We’re looking for comfort with concepts like subqueries, temp tables, and window functions.Excel wizardry. For example, we'd love for you to know everything there is to know about Pivot Tables.Thorough knowledge of a BI platform such as Tableau, Qlik, Cognos, or Crystal.Knowledge and interest in the landscape of healthcare quality improvement and population health management.Excellent written and verbal communication skills. The ability to lead effective conversations with a variety of health center stakeholders, including technical folks, clinicians, and executives, is a key job requirement.Some experience with scripting languages such as Python or Ruby, or a desire and aptitude to learn.Be nice, and value collaboration.", "Join a\xa0small team of people\xa0(currently, there are 27 of us) who love what we do and continually strive to delight our customers.Help us build a company culture that's friendly, respectful, and encourages continual learning.", 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills. The ability to lead effective conversations with a variety of health center stakeholders, including technical folks, clinicians, and executives, is a key job requirement.', 'This job is both technical and people-oriented. Successful applicants may come from a variety of backgrounds, but if you have a track record as an outstanding analyst, analyst-manager, or director of data at a health center, hospital, or ACO, we’d particularly like to talk to you.', 'Lead new health center implementations. Conduct stakeholder meetings; develop a detailed understanding of customer business processes; extract, clean, and analyze EHR data; write lots of SQL… and get folks excited about collaborating with Relevant!', 'Provide analytics support to our health centers. Ensure that our platform is being used as effectively as possible to improve patient outcomes and health center operations. Conceive, manage, and execute data initiatives for health centers; build reports and data visualizations as required; lead regular stakeholder meetings; provide advanced training and technical assistance to health center data teams.', 'Health centers love working with us, and our data analysts are a key reason why. They lead implementations of our platform, often helping to resolve long-standing organizational pain points around data and reporting along the way. After implementation, they act as a resource for the health center’s internal data team, helping them solve hard problems, sharing knowledge and best practices, and building up their internal capacity.']

['', 'Assist in month end close activities', 'Strong work ethic - exhibits sense of urgency to complete and ownership of results', 'Ability to translate detail into clear, concise, insightful executive communications', 'Required Competencies:', 'Bachelors Degree in appropriate field of study or equivalent work experience. Project financing experience. Project management experience. Business Development experience. Financial modeling experience and working knowledge in any or all of the following: Regulated utility financial structures and business segments; Accounting, structuring, and modeling.', 'Desired Qualifications:', 'Bachelors degree in relevant field of study (e.g. finance, accounting, economics, engineering, others acceptable if candidate can relate studies to position requirements). 5-10 years financial modeling (specifically valuation) or energy industry experience (one or the other minimum).', 'Receptive to, and capable of championing organizational and process change', 'Able to partner with, but remain independent of business project sponsors', 'Detail-oriented', 'Provide support in managing the work management productivity reporting', 'Maintain SOS data and documentation', 'Technical experience with SAP, SQL, Python, SOS, and Tableau (and ability to keep up with program updates & enhancements)', 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Develop and maintain dashboards for the T&D portfolio', 'Ability to work independently and with others', 'The primary purpose of this position is to provide support to the Investment Delivery Assurance department in managing the capital investment plan. This position will also be responsible for continuously maintaining data consistency and accuracy into the investment optimization tool (SOS) for the purpose of risk scoring and ranking. The position will support project performance through analysis of financial results, forecasts, variances, and trends. This position will be responsible for cost benefit analysis using financial measures to support the overall project evaluation process across the company.', 'Utilize financial models to perform cost benefit analysis and provide ad-hoc support in estimating hard and soft dollar savings/benefits of an investment. Additionally, provide clear, concise, and insightful communications of the assumptions, value drivers, and results.', 'Financial modeling acumen']

job_title: I.T. Business Analyst – 6 Month Contract – Southfield, MI
job_text: ['', 'I.T. Business Analyst – 6 Month Contract – Southfield, MI', 'I look forward to hearing from you.', 'Skills\xa0–\xa0Business Analyst, I.T., I.T. On Premise Systems, Cloud Based Platforms, I.T. Business Analyst', 'Experience working directly with IT and business/functional team members to understand project concept, objectives and approach. Strong preference is given to those who have continued to upgrade their skills through education and training.', 'Please send resumes directly to\xa0patrick.hindmarsh@stottandmay.com\xa0and we can run through the further specifics of the role.', 'Proven experience in enterprise applications and understanding of cloud-based systems (ideally in the Marketing, Legal or Risk space)', 'Minimum four (4) years of professional experience in IT technical services.', 'Due to industry requirements, U.S. Citizens and Green Card holders are encouraged to apply. No third-party agencies need apply or will be considered.', '\xa0', 'Skills', 'Minimum four (4) years of professional experience in IT technical services.Proven experience in enterprise applications and understanding of cloud-based systems (ideally in the Marketing, Legal or Risk space)Experience working directly with IT and business/functional team members to understand project concept, objectives and approach. Strong preference is given to those who have continued to upgrade their skills through education and training.Experience documenting and diagramming business and IT processes – familiarity with Business Process Model and Notation, Flowcharting, and understanding of core Business Architecture concepts.Understanding of ITSM, ITIL, SDLC concepts and frameworks – experience with practical application and implementation is a plus.Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with strong consultative, critical thinking and analytic skills', 'Contract Rates - $60-$65 Per Hour All Inclusive (Corp to Corp)', 'Experience documenting and diagramming business and IT processes – familiarity with Business Process Model and Notation, Flowcharting, and understanding of core Business Architecture concepts.', 'My client who is a leading Global Consulting firm is currently looking to on board an experienced I.T. Business Analyst with ideally a specific background in the Marketing System/Platform areas.', 'This is an initial 6 month contract with extensions to potentially follow. The role will see individuals working out of the Southfield, MI offices once covid restrictions are lifted. Until that point, you will be able to work remotely, but would need to be based in/around the Detroit Metro area. ', 'The Candidate:', 'patrick.hindmarsh@stottandmay.com', 'I.T. Business Analyst with ideally a specific background in the Marketing System/Platform areas.', 'Understanding of ITSM, ITIL, SDLC concepts and frameworks – experience with practical application and implementation is a plus.', 'Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with strong consultative, critical thinking and analytic skills']

job_title: Senior Analyst/Associate- Portfolio Management, Project Finance
job_text: ['', 'The origination and execution of Project Finance transaction is done by the PIPF Origination and Execution Group which is a part of the Asset Finance and Securitization (“ASF”) group.', '• Perform financial modeling and run sensitivities for transactions; interpret model results and create summaries to be used in internal and external documents.', '• Strong Microsoft Office skills, especially financial modelling skills in Microsoft Excel.', '• Take ownership and lead other initiatives such as industry reviews, simulations of the entire portfolio based on certain parameters etc.', '• Good interpersonal skills and team spirit.', 'Power, Infrastructure and Project Finance (“PIPF”) provides advisory services, arranges, structures and advances non-recourse (or limited recourse) loans for client activities including power and energy; renewables, such as wind, solar and bio-fuel; and infrastructure projects. PIPF maintains a large, diversified loan portfolio of over 70 borrowers.', '• Understand and independently manage all aspects of a number of assigned Project Finance accounts, including credit, legal, and compliance issues. Assigned accounts could include several complex transactions including deals where BNPP is the Agent Bank. Deals will include, gas-fired merchant power plants, renewables, infrastructure projects, etc.', 'Minimum Required Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', '• Help in origination and execution activities wherever appropriate.', '•\xa0Prior experience in Project Finance (or other structured finance products).', 'FINRA Registrations Required:\xa0', 'N/A', '• MBA / CFA / CPA would be a plus', '• Good verbal and written communication skills required (ability to present a deal structure and highlights to credit committees, senior management, and other lenders).', 'FINRA Registrations Required:', 'Minimum Required Qualifications:', 'PIPF Account & Credit Management Team is a part of the Credit & Portfolio Management group, and is responsible for the monitoring and proactive management of the PIPF loan portfolio in North and Latin America, after the initial closing until termination / repayment.', '• Prepare credit and financial analysis and complete Annual Reviews and Quarterly Watchlist / Doubtful Reports.', 'Business Overview: ', '• Familiarity with and efficiency in reading and understanding legal documentation (preferably legal documentation related to Project Finance including security agreements and project agreements).', 'Agency Account Management:', 'Other:', '• Ability to work reasonably long hours and meet tight deadlines.', '• Spanish language will be a plus.', '• Liaise with the Bank’s Restructuring team for troubled deals.', '• Good understanding of and familiarity with financial statements, accounting, corporate finance principles, debt structures, etc.', '• Handle compliance and covenant related issues, including monitoring compliance receivables for each account.', 'Portfolio and Account Management:', '• Negotiate and co-ordinate amendment and waiver requests for deals Agented by BNPP; liaise directly with borrowers, legal counsel, consultants, and Lenders.', '• Prepare internal credit proposals for amendments, waivers, and other requests for deals where BNPP is a participant.', '• Prepare credit-focused memos for internal and external dissemination.', '• Respond to ad-hoc requests for reports and presentations from Risk and Management.', '• Update, discuss, and answer questions from participant Lenders on a daily basis.', '• Attend meetings and conference calls with Lenders and clients.', '• Review legal documentation and manage legal due diligence process with appointed lawyers.', '• Bachelor’s degree', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', '• Contribute to PIPF Portfolio Review, including overview of the PIPF portfolio, sector concentration, historical evolution of the portfolio, etc.', 'Preferred Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', '• Proactively identify risks in the portfolio and deteriorating credits; communicate proactively with senior managers, Risk officers, Origination team members, relationship managers etc.', 'Preferred Qualifications:']

['', 'Please note that salary information estimated is based on LinkedIn research and may not accurately reflect actual salary ranges at Venable.', 'The ideal candidates will be responsible for...\xa0\xa0', '•A minimum of 3 years’ experience working as a Business Analyst', '•Strong focus on detailed, well organized requirements gathering taking into consideration all departments and systems within the firm', '•Experience working effectively in a highly collaborative, team-oriented environment', '•Performing feasibility analysis and scopes projects; working with management team to prioritize deliverables, and negotiate on product functionalities', 'Venable LLP is seeking a collaborative Business Analyst to join our growing Information Technology team in Baltimore, MD. The Business Analyst will review business processes, identify improvements and participate in the testing process.', 'Venable LLP is an American Lawyer Global 100 law firm headquartered in Washington, DC, with offices in California, Delaware, Maryland, New York, and Virginia.\xa0Our lawyers and legislative advisors serve domestic and international clients in all areas of corporate and business law, complex litigation, intellectual property, regulatory matters, and government affairs.\xa0Additional information can be found at www.Venable.com.', 'Venable holds certain guiding principles central to its hiring and employee development processes. We value integrity, collaboration, professionalism, hard work, and client service at every level. Interested in adding your voice to Venable? We would love to hear from you.', 'The successful candidates will demonstrate...\xa0', '•Experience performing basic SQL queries; requirements gathering software frameworks a plus', '•Attention to detail and commitment to high quality/error free deliverables', '•Creating detailed Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and translating into functional specifications for Developer consumption', '•Partnering with Development and Business Intelligence teams to define reporting requirements on software solutions', '•Developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, and diagrams; actively participating in product design reviews', '•Experience with Microsoft Office suite, specifically Visio, Word, Excel and PowerPoint', '_________________________________________________________________________________', '•Coordinating and participating in Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and Functionality Testing', 'Venable LLP is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer, committed to ensuring our workforce reflects America’s diverse population.\xa0', '•Participating in project management processes, as defined by IT, by coordinating with various departments to ensure successful implementation of firm projects']

['', 'Work within a team of research scientists, data curators, and outreach and communication specialists to curate, distribute, and publicize highly-dimensional biomedical data sets coming from multiple NIH supported programs.', 'We’d love to hear from you if you:\xa0', 'Have an\xa0interest in learning about new high throughput biological technologies.', 'What you’ll be doing:\xa0', 'Have a master’s degree in computational field, library science, data management, OR a bachelor’s degree in one of the above areas with 3+ years of relevant work experience. A minimum of 2 years working with high dimensional data repositories is preferred.Have experience working with common biomedical data types derived from disease model systems and patients. Experience with gene expression and other omic data is preferred.Have an\xa0interest in learning about new high throughput biological technologies.Are proficient in a scripting language such as Python or R.Have a basic understanding of SQL.Are highly organized and have great attention to detail.Are able to work individually and within a team.Are passionate about open science and collaboration.', 'Have a basic understanding of SQL.', 'At Sage Bionetworks, we believe that we can learn more by learning from each other. We develop and apply open practices to data-driven research for the advancement of human health. We are working to establish actionable biomedical observations through the reliable analysis and responsible sharing of representative data. By improving the way scientists collaborate and by increasing the reliability of research, we will improve human health.\xa0', 'Develop or extend existing data models/schemas for projects in coordination with Project Leads.', 'Document data ingest processes and curation SOPs. Write data release notes. Produce data reports.', 'Are proficient in a scripting language such as Python or R.', 'Maintain research collections for disease communities, such as the AD Knowledge Portal (adknowledgeportal.org).', 'Are highly organized and have great attention to detail.', '\xa0', 'Are able to work individually and within a team.', 'Are passionate about open science and collaboration.', 'About Sage Bionetworks\xa0', 'Have a master’s degree in computational field, library science, data management, OR a bachelor’s degree in one of the above areas with 3+ years of relevant work experience. A minimum of 2 years working with high dimensional data repositories is preferred.', 'This position will play a critical role in our scientific research communities by providing support of biomedical data repositories through data curation, and the development of data formats and metadata standards. We are looking for someone who understands the complexities of combining heterogeneous biological data sources, the difficulties of standardizing metadata, and the value that these efforts provide in the support of reproducible research', 'In light of recent concerns of Covid-19, all interviews will be conducted remotely, and most positions will be remote through at least June 30, 2021. The option to work on-site at our Seattle office prior to June 30, will be considered upon request.', 'Sage Bionetworks is a nonprofit biomedical research and technology development organization that was founded in Seattle in 2009. Our focus is to develop and apply open practices to data-driven research for the advancement of human health. Data-driven research has become an important component of biomedicine, but it’s not always easy to understand how to apply computational approaches appropriately or how to interpret their results. Sage believes open practices can help. Our interdisciplinary team of scientists and engineers work together to provide researchers access to technology tools and scientific approaches to share data, benchmark methods, and explore collective insights, all backed by Sage’s gold-standard governance protocols and commitment to user-centered design. Sage is supported through a portfolio of competitive research grants, commercial partnerships, and philanthropic contributions.', 'Have experience working with common biomedical data types derived from disease model systems and patients. Experience with gene expression and other omic data is preferred.', 'Sage embraces diversity, equity and inclusion. We are committed to pay parity and making our salary ranges available to all employees. We invite you to apply and we welcome a conversation. We are based in Seattle, WA, and collaborate broadly throughout the world.', 'Work within a team of research scientists, data curators, and outreach and communication specialists to curate, distribute, and publicize highly-dimensional biomedical data sets coming from multiple NIH supported programs.Develop and document metadata standards for sharing datasets under the FAIR guiding principles.Develop or extend existing data models/schemas for projects in coordination with Project Leads.Document data ingest processes and curation SOPs. Write data release notes. Produce data reports.Maintain research collections for disease communities, such as the AD Knowledge Portal (adknowledgeportal.org).Streamline and implement new processes for data curation using scripting and statistical programming.Manage access to sensitive datasets in collaboration with the Sage governance team.', 'Manage access to sensitive datasets in collaboration with the Sage governance team.', 'Streamline and implement new processes for data curation using scripting and statistical programming.', 'Develop and document metadata standards for sharing datasets under the FAIR guiding principles.']

job_title: Business Analyst - Remote in AZ, CA, CO, ID, NV, UT, TX
job_text: ['', ' Drive processes and improvement initiatives by gathering and documenting business requirements. ', ' Produce, publish and distribute operational reports relating to the development and performance of products and processes. ', '  Review, analyze and evaluate business processes, procedures and user needs.   Provide data analysis to support, compile and report key information for operations and business objectives.   Drive processes and improvement initiatives by gathering and documenting business requirements.   Perform and participate in the analysis, design and implementation of business processes and procedures following appropriate standards.   Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for the business and clients.   Communicate analysis and interpretation to appropriate audience.   Produce, publish and distribute operational reports relating to the development and performance of products and processes.   Conduct tests or test planning sessions, provide input for feasibility and prepare user documentation and follow-up evaluation.   Act as a liaison with various departments, management and staff to resolve problems and improve processes and procedures.   Perform project management leadership functions as a project manager or team member.   Other duties as assigned.', ' Act as a liaison with various departments, management and staff to resolve problems and improve processes and procedures. ['', 'At least one of the following credentials a plus: CPA, CFA, MBA', 'Experience researching, analyzing, or auditing companies', 'Responsibilities:', 'Willing to travel occasionally', 'This job currently remote due to COVID, but Analysts would typically work from our office in Rockville, MD.', '2+ years plus experience in finance, auditing or accounting disciplineExperience researching, analyzing, or auditing companiesExperience with U.S. banks either at a regulatory agency, bank financial data provider, or within a bank CECL / capital modelling team preferredDeep knowledge of financial sector data and tools (S&P Market Intelligence/SNL, etc.) Strong background in financial statement analysisAt least one of the following credentials a plus: CPA, CFA, MBAStrong knowledge of and interest in financial marketsSuperior written and oral communication skills, and ability to work well within a team environmentExperienced presentation delivery, including comfort in discussing analysis and methodology in a face-to-face environment to prospects and clientsWilling to travel occasionally', '* Perform custom research projects for clients.', 'CFRA research analysts conduct and publish forensic financial statement analysis equity research on publicly traded companies for dissemination to its client base, including institutional investors, underwriters, regulators, and law practices. The analyst will work with team members covering a variety of companies and conducting bespoke analyses for clients. Research and analysis will be a combination of qualitative and quantitative research which ultimately leads to published research. This includes rigorous financial statement analysis as well as gathering and interpreting company-specific and sector-specific data, as the analyst develops and produces company and industry reports. You will play a key role in communicating this research to the client base therefore, strong communication skills as well as confidence to discuss research with senior portfolio managers and analysts are a must.  ', 'Experienced presentation delivery, including comfort in discussing analysis and methodology in a face-to-face environment to prospects and clients', '* Publish high-impact reports to be delivered to investment managers, hedge funds and others financial institutions detailing our research findings.', '* Collaborate with other members of industry sector teams and support senior analysts to develop research ideas.', 'Deep knowledge of financial sector data and tools (S&P Market Intelligence/SNL, etc.) Strong background in financial statement analysis', '* Communicate with clients regarding companies analyzed, industry issues or accounting topics of interest.', '2+ years plus experience in finance, auditing or accounting discipline', 'Requirements:', 'Experience with U.S. banks either at a regulatory agency, bank financial data provider, or within a bank CECL / capital modelling team preferred', 'Superior written and oral communication skills, and ability to work well within a team environment', '* Rigorous analysis of public company financial data, news and other information to identify the varied risks facing companies.', 'Strong knowledge of and interest in financial markets']

['Job Title: Project Co-ordinator/ Business Analyst - Level 1', 'The Project Coordinator is responsible for the accurate preparation and timely dissemination of information to the CJIS Governing Board, Legislators, CJIS Community, and Stakeholders. ', 'Attends Governing Board and Governance Committee meetings and prepares documentation, manages material distribution, room/equipment/presentation set up, creates minutes, and other items as needed.', 'Required Skills/Experience', 'Ability to understand and grasp technical information and translate it into a language that can be easily understood by a non-technical audience.', 'Duration: 12 Months ', 'Writes the bi-annual legislative report that encompasses project updates and overviews.', 'Possesses excellent analytical, writing, editing, and proofreading skills paying close attention to matters of consistency, punctuation, grammar, and detail.', 'Experience in website content management', 'Location: Hartford, CT', 'Must be versant with templates, presentation slides, and importing objects from other Microsoft Office products. ', 'Interviews subject matter experts for articles and other written materials.', 'Writes and/or drafts technical documents, articles, or related material based on research, investigation or analysis.', 'Provides consultation, makes recommendations, and gives appropriate advice.', 'Ability to work with sensitive information and keep that information confidential.', 'This includes writing, creating, and documenting all presentations, reports, and communications related to all CJIS projects. ', 'In order to show progress and visibility, the CJIS team needs a Project Coordinator.', 'Scope of Work', 'Specific Services Required', 'Ability to create graphics, illustrations, and other visual materials.', 'The candidate must have at least 3 years of experience in the following skills:', 'Supports the Executive Director in all matters relating to CJIS and its Governing Board.', 'Expert knowledge of Microsoft PowerPoint, Word, and Outlook. ', 'Possesses strong time management skills while balancing multiple priorities.', 'Reviews and edits the business or technical writing of others. ', 'Ability to work in a team environment and to take on additional responsibilities to assist others.', 'Supervises office supplies and processes orders for office supplies.', 'Prepares and assists in the preparation of reports, papers, manuals, minutes, and presentations.', "The main focus of the Project Coordinator will be to assist the Executive Director and his management staff in performing various administrative duties, writing and publishing a monthly newsletter, creating and editing PowerPoint presentations for Quarterly Board Meetings and other staff's presentations to stakeholders, recording and preparing minutes on the Quarterly Board Meetings and other CJIS meetings, updating and filing the bi-annual Legislative Reports, assisting in document preparation, and researching, discovering, analyzing and coordinating information at the direction of Executive Director.", "Tasks can include sending meeting invites, emails, presentation preparation, document creation, coordinating team members' timely input for document content, information research and analysis, discovery, distribution and/or photocopying, taking minutes, etc.", 'Experience with creating and publishing a professional monthly newsletter.', " The Project Coordinator is responsible for the accurate preparation and timely dissemination of information to the CJIS Governing Board, Legislators, CJIS Community, and Stakeholders.  This person, working with the CJIS Executive Director, Program Manager, and Project Managers, will perform all manner of office administration in support of the CJIS Governing Board objectives.  This includes writing, creating, and documenting all presentations, reports, and communications related to all CJIS projects.  The main focus of the Project Coordinator will be to assist the Executive Director and his management staff in performing various administrative duties, writing and publishing a monthly newsletter, creating and editing PowerPoint presentations for Quarterly Board Meetings and other staff's presentations to stakeholders, recording and preparing minutes on the Quarterly Board Meetings and other CJIS meetings, updating and filing the bi-annual Legislative Reports, assisting in document preparation, and researching, discovering, analyzing and coordinating information at the direction of Executive Director. Specific Services Required Supports the Executive Director in all matters relating to CJIS and its Governing Board. Supervises office supplies and processes orders for office supplies. Works as a team member and assists other CJIS executive staff and project managers as needed.  Tasks can include sending meeting invites, emails, presentation preparation, document creation, coordinating team members' timely input for document content, information research and analysis, discovery, distribution and/or photocopying, taking minutes, etc. Interviews subject matter experts for articles and other written materials. Writes the bi-annual legislative report that encompasses project updates and overviews. Prepares and assists in the preparation of reports, papers, manuals, minutes, and presentations. Prepares or assists in the preparation of departmental policies, guidelines. Attends Governing Board and Governance Committee meetings and prepares documentation, manages material distribution, room/equipment/presentation set up, creates minutes, and other items as needed. Edits the CJIS Website and uploads documents. Writes and/or drafts technical documents, articles, or related material based on research, investigation or analysis. Reviews and edits the business or technical writing of others.  Provides consultation, makes recommendations, and gives appropriate advice. Assists other staff as requested. ['', 'This role will be involved in the implementation of the Internal audit program at DSO and Regulatory and corporate audits.', 'This position assists in the management of Quality Risk Management (QRM) and Data Integrity (DI) activities, updates procedures to meet corporate and cGMP requirements, and ensure closure of required records.', 'Maintain an Electronic Systems Administrator program to comply with the requirements of the FDA, EU and ISO 13485:2003, and other relevant regulatory bodies.', 'This role will work directly in the GMP and non-GMP databases used to support the QRM and DI activities. This role is required to be proficient in the use of the databases and train and support DSO employees using the systems.', 'internal requirements include compliance with ethics, environmental health and safety, financial, human resources, and general business policies, requirements and objectives.', 'Electronic System Compliance & Governance', 'Audit Trail Management & Review.', 'This role will also function as a primary contact for all QRM and DI projects, and thus be required to establish and maintain strong working relationships.', 'Job Description: This role is responsible for supporting the Biologics Quality Risk Management (QRM) ,Data Integrity (DI) programs utilized by Drug Substances Operations.', 'Develop strategies to ensure successful audit and inspection outcomes for QRM and DI. Provide SME input in terms of RCA, CAPA and Investigations.', 'Responsible for building teams, providing training and on-going guidance of employees. Create templates, procedures, assessments, protocols and other documentation for the QRM program.', 'This position provides hands on support throughout the organization to assures QRM activities are actively monitored, actions completed, and periodically re-evaluated.', 'This position assures DSO (BSL and BLI) meets worldwide MOH cGMP regulatory requirements for Quality Risk Management (QRM) and Data Integrity (DI).', 'Responsible for oversight and support of the Quality Risk management and Data Integrity compliance programs throughout the Drug Substance Organization (DSO), including GMP support functions.', 'Other functions:', 'contract to hire opportunity', 'In addition, this role will be involved in Internal audit management, Regulatory body audits, and corporate audits.', 'This role will also plan and execute Compliance readiness plan as needed.', 'This role will partner with the DSO manufacturing sites (Bioscience Laboratories Campbell and Bioscience Laboratories Irvine), Global Quality Assurance, Procurement, Engineering and other functions, to establish the required business relationships.', 'Quality Risk Management:', 'The employee must conduct their work activities in compliance with all internal requirements and with all applicable regulatory requirements.', 'Data Integrity:', 'Data Backup and Restore, Data Archiving and Migration. Ensure Electronic System availability by assuring performance of User Account Provisioning\\Deprovisioning, User Access Periodic Reviews, Disaster Recovery Testing, and if needed, System Recovery. Provide subject matter expertise for change controls for data integrity, OS Updates\\Patches, electronic systems requirements and data security.', 'These activities include internal and external compliance systems, GMP, GCP and GLP evaluation, and managing corporate driven initiatives to assure DSO compliance and timely completion of projects.', 'Databases include, but are not limited to, Document Management, Trackwise, Training, Microsoft Office.', 'Compliance planning and execution:', 'Electronic System Compliance & GovernanceAudit Trail Management & Review.Electronic System Inventory ManagementSupport New Projects (Electronic Systems)', 'This position works with Corporate to assure appropriate resources are available and guidances are implemented at the site level.', 'Support New Projects (Electronic Systems)', 'This position assists in providing on-going QRM and DI training to DSO employees. This position supports continuous improvement activities within the DSO and assure compliance with all cGMP requirements.', 'Provide Electronic System Compliance expertise in for the revision of DI standards and to provide recommendations regarding DI training materials and;', 'Responsible for working with Business Technology for the creation and management of GMP Electronic System Data Lifecycle Management activities such as:', 'Provide support, expertise, and direction to Biologics sites during regulatory audits and inspection.', 'This role will also plan and execute Compliance readiness plan as needed. The scope of this responsibility includes DSO Facilities (BSL and BLI) and support organizations (GPT, Engineering, EH&S, etc.)', 'Electronic System Inventory Management', 'The plan will ensure audit readiness and successful MOH outcomes for licensure for non-commercial site and inspection readiness for commercial site.', 'This role will act as the liaison between DSO and Global Quality Organizations to assure compliance to company policy and support site inspections.', 'This role will design and implement a plan to ensure complete compliance to cGMP and all regulatory requirements.', '330172']

['', 'Excellent academic record', 'Who You Are: We are seeking a talented business analyst to join our growing team. This individual will help with a wide range of business processes, systems, and data projects. The ideal candidate is excited to learn new technologies, including Salesforce if you haven’t worked with it before, and isn’t afraid of a challenge. ['', ' A Few Important Facts About Working At Kairos Aerospace ', " We do not track vacation time, nor do we have set hours to be in the office. job_title: Senior Analyst, Business Analyst, Marketing Analyst
job_text: ['', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'The individual should have hands-on knowledge of digital marketing platforms and the ability to combine large customer datasets that will feed into our BI tools.', 'Excellent understanding of digital marketing analytics and strong interest in how it works “under the hood"', 'Create self-service BI solutions - Build data solutions and dashboards that allow end users to answer their most critical marketing questionsBuild best in class datasets – Leverage our ETL tool to build integrated datasets that provide a central view into our clients marketing efforts. Own the ingestion, cleansing and aggregation of those datasetsTranslate Measurement frameworks - Partner with analytics leads, activation and account teams to translate measurement frameworks into interactive dashboard deliverablesAutomate manual reporting - Own the process of data transformation and translating Excel and PPT deliverables into BI solutionsBe a trusted partner - Partner with marketing analytics leaders to create best in class dashboard designs and BI processes. Educate and train analytics and related teams on the benefits of using our BI solution', 'Automate manual reporting - Own the process of data transformation and translating Excel and PPT deliverables into BI solutions', 'We are committed to being an Equal Opportunity employer.\xa0As such, we seek motivated and qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, ethnic or national origin, age, physical or mental disability, genetic information, marital information, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local employment discrimination laws where operates.\xa0We strive to employ, motivate, advance and reasonably accommodate any qualified employees and applicants.\xa0We believe diversity of persons and ideas forms the most comprehensive, forward-looking company.', 'Extensive knowledge and working experience with at least two BI platforms (e.g. DOMO, Tableau, Looker, Microsoft Power BI, etc.)', 'All employees are working remote for the rest of 2020; once the offices re-open, this position can in be in our New York City office, Philadelphia office, or Florham Park, NJ office.', 'Experience in connecting, cleansing and blending data within an ETL or SQL environment', 'Create self-service BI solutions - Build data solutions and dashboards that allow end users to answer their most critical marketing questions', '5+ years of experience developing business intelligence analytics deliverables5-8 years of experience in digital marketing and/or communications analyticsExperience in connecting, cleansing and blending data within an ETL or SQL environmentExtensive knowledge and working experience with at least two BI platforms (e.g. DOMO, Tableau, Looker, Microsoft Power BI, etc.)SQL experience is a mustExcellent understanding of digital marketing analytics and strong interest in how it works “under the hood"', '\xa0', '5+ years of experience developing business intelligence analytics deliverables', 'We offer a comprehensive benefit program and perks, including flexible PTO, expanded paid leave for new parents including a 4th Trimester program that helps new parents transition back to work, and a five-week sabbatical program.\xa0Other perks include Income Protection, Retirement plans/401(k) match, and cell phone savings plans.\xa0', 'Be a trusted partner - Partner with marketing analytics leaders to create best in class dashboard designs and BI processes. Educate and train analytics and related teams on the benefits of using our BI solution', '5-8 years of experience in digital marketing and/or communications analytics', 'Senior Analyst, Business Intelligence, Marketing Analytics', 'Build best in class datasets – Leverage our ETL tool to build integrated datasets that provide a central view into our clients marketing efforts. Own the ingestion, cleansing and aggregation of those datasets', 'Translate Measurement frameworks - Partner with analytics leads, activation and account teams to translate measurement frameworks into interactive dashboard deliverables', 'SQL experience is a must', 'The\xa0Senior Analyst, Business Intelligence, Marketing Analytics\xa0role is a blend of data management, marketing analytics, and business intelligence. This individual will work closely with accounts teams to understand the data they use to drive optimizations and decision making. They will support the delivery of business intelligence solutions by centralizing customer datasets, leveraging ETL processes, and building and designing interactive dashboards and reporting.']

['', 'POSITION OVERVIEW', 'Excellent research skills with experience in market and company analysis', 'Strong analytical approach; structured thinker', 'M&A deals support & execution', 'Portfolio companies monitoring & communication', 'Deal structuring and review legal documents', 'Research and apply critical thinking to industry trends, competitor dynamics and current events to provide relevant business insights', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Minimum of 1 year of work experience at an investment bank, private equity, or other large company in a strategy or M&A group', 'Build business cases in support of key decisions and growth opportunities', 'Structure complex business problems into project frameworks that can be analyzed and solved', '\xa0', 'Previous deal experience working in a multinational company in industrials or energy', 'They are looking for a Corporate Development- M&A Senior Analyst who would be responsible for a range of projects and initiatives, including portfolio companies monitoring & communication, new deals search, target industry research, and pure M&A role and deeply involved with deals support, and internal reporting & communications support. The Senior Analyst will support the corporate investment directors by actively engaging in M&A deals with analytical rigor and business insights. This position reports to the VP of the Corporate Development group.', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'Ability to interact with staff at all levels in a fast-paced environment', 'Collaborate effectively with other affiliated members and management', 'Internal reporting & communication support', 'Our client is an Industrial/Building Products related company located in the Dallas-Fort Worth area.', 'Lead valuation analysis by building comprehensive financial models', 'Perform quantitative analysis, including building and organizing large datasets', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to present and explain complex information clearly', 'Proven ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment', 'Excellent financial modeling skills and strong accounting background', 'Excellent interpersonal skills', 'Team player with experience working both in teams and as an individual contributor', 'Target industry research. Generate reports & New deals search', 'Synthesize findings and summarize a broad range of data inputs into frameworks that enable clear communication of data and insights']

['', 'Lead complete research and development projects in collaboration with build, test, and engineering teams, including planning, experimental design and preparation, execution, and communication of final results', 'Formulate, lead, and facilitate complex data analysis projects.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Strong knowledge of and experience with programming (python, ETL frameworks, cloud computing) and databases (SQL, etc)', 'We are looking to build relationships with people who share our values:', 'Excellence without Ego.', 'Driven by our vision of the affordable, reliable, net-zero carbon grid of the future, Mainspring has developed\xa0a new category of power generation — the linear generator — that delivers onsite, fuel-flexible power to\xa0help\xa0accelerate the transition to the future grid.\xa0', 'work at the interface of mechanical/systems engineering, data analysis/science,', 'Adept at report writing and presentation of results', 'Pragmatic Optimism.', 'Responsibilities\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'The Linear Generator is a sophisticated, automated, and integrated system spanning a wide range of engineering disciplines including thermodynamics, mechanical, electrical, software, and controls. You will lead, design, perform, and analyze experiments on our Linear Generators as part of a dynamic test engineering team. This includes hands-on work and operation on our Linear Generator prototypes and test system, debugging, and advanced data analysis aimed at improving our product. This position is within the test engineer team with a strong focus on exploring our diverse stream of data to extract insights about performance and durability of our units, and will require strong collaboration with the software team that is developing architecture and infrastructure of our software systems. ', 'and software engineering with activities that will include:', 'The unique combination of attributes offered by Mainspring’s linear generator enables applications on both the customer and utility sides of the meter for the $750B global electricity equipment market. Mainspring began pilot customer installations in 2020 and plans its full commercial launch in 2021 with Fortune 100 customers and partnerships with top-tier utilities.', 'Proactive Collaboration.', 'Proficiency in statistics, data analysis, and research methods', 'Mainspring is based in Menlo Park and is backed by top-tier venture and strategic investors such as Khosla Ventures, Bill Gates, American Electric Power, and Centrica Innovations.\xa0More information can be found at www.mainspringenergy.com.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Pragmatic Optimism.\xa0Building a new category of world-class power generation requires the optimism of ambition and creativity, balanced with practicality to solve problems efficiently.\xa0The challenges that arise are opportunities for growth.\xa0\xa0Excellence without Ego.\xa0We bring expertise and commitment to creating the best customer experience, from sales to deployment and service, just as we apply deep technical rigor to building and delivering culture of inclusion and respect extends beyond our team to interactions with our partners and customers.', 'Provide insights about the performances of our linear generators using time series data ['Qualifications', 'Strong problem solving and consulting skills', 'Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Economics or related quantitative field required; advanced degree preferred.1 - 5 years of experienceDemonstrated proficiency in multiple digital marketing channelsUnderstanding of relational databases and familiarity with data processing.Experience with high-level scripting languagesExperience managing a team of analysts or other creative thinkersQuantitative field academic/professional experience (Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Finance, Engineering)Experience with digital marketing or web analytics preferred (Omniture, CoreMetrics, Google Analytics, WebTrends, etc.)Media Platforms and 3rd Party Tools (Google Adwords, DoubleClick, MediaMath, Bing Ads, ExactTarget, Hitwise, BrightEdge, Facebook, etc.)CRM Data Analysis (Customer Segmentation, Churn, Lifetime Value, Acquisition, etc.)Excellent written and oral presentation skillsStrong problem solving and consulting skills', 'Quickly understand multiple data sources and develop methodology for joining data that will add value', 'At Merkle, we believe that a diverse environment improves us as a community and as a business. We want to foster an environment of growth, where all ideas and contributions are encouraged. We need this culture of courage to continue to thrive in our fast-paced industry. We embrace differences of opinion. We value diversity of experience and thought, which help us to challenge and define industry-leading solutions, and support our goal of being a great place to work.', 'Quantitative field academic/professional experience (Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Finance, Engineering)', 'Manage a team of analysts spanning multiple clients ensuring that objectives are being met.', 'Additional Information', 'Experience with digital marketing or web analytics preferred (Omniture, CoreMetrics, Google Analytics, WebTrends, etc.)', 'Media Platforms and 3rd Party Tools (Google Adwords, DoubleClick, MediaMath, Bing Ads, ExactTarget, Hitwise, BrightEdge, Facebook, etc.)', 'Project manage the coding of models in SQL/Hadoop-Hive and SAS/R/Python', 'Demonstrated proficiency in multiple digital marketing channels', 'Excellent written and oral presentation skills', 'Architect solutions & provide recommendations that drive results on client campaigns & objectivesDevelop custom performance reporting and analyses across multiple channels/clientsProject manage the coding of models in SQL/Hadoop-Hive and SAS/R/PythonWork with various internal stakeholders to ensure projects are completed in a timely manner.Quickly understand multiple data sources and develop methodology for joining data that will add valueManage a team of analysts spanning multiple clients ensuring that objectives are being met.', 'Work with various internal stakeholders to ensure projects are completed in a timely manner.', 'All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'A highly qualified analytics professional with professional experience optimizing multiple digital marketing channels as well as leading projects/analysts to greatness. The Digital Media Analytics Senior Analyst is focused on supporting our Digital Media business (PPC/SEO, Display, Paid Social) within the Digital Agency Group.\xa0 The position will be providing analytic direction on strategic clients and helping guide analysts to improve our clients’ digital marketing programs.\xa0 Digital Media Analytics Senior Analyst will serve as a primary point of contact between many of our clients and stakeholders around managing and enhancing our client’s digital measurement.\xa0 They will also be part of a growing multifaceted digital analytics team that develops advanced analytic solutions for top companies across industries.', 'Develop custom performance reporting and analyses across multiple channels/clients', 'Architect solutions & provide recommendations that drive results on client campaigns & objectives', 'Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Economics or related quantitative field required; advanced degree preferred.', 'Experience with high-level scripting languages', '1 - 5 years of experience', 'CRM Data Analysis (Customer Segmentation, Churn, Lifetime Value, Acquisition, etc.)', 'Understanding of relational databases and familiarity with data processing.', 'Experience managing a team of analysts or other creative thinkers']

job_title: Client Offboarding – Business Analyst for NYC Investment Bank
job_text: ['', 'Rate- 430/day: W2 only', ' • Understanding of the workings of an investment bank and the lifecycle of a trade is a plus', ' • Proactively communicate and collaborate with external and internal customers to deliver the following artefacts as needed: Business Requirements Document, Functional Specification Document, User Stories, MIS and Power Point presentations', ' ', ' • Ensure key stakeholders are kept informed of the progress and challenges and escalating issues where appropriate', ' The candidate will work with the respective business units to obtain the relevant information for KYC Offboarding, and to analyze and assist with account closures. The candidate will also bring their experience and understanding of process improvement methodology, as well as discipline and structure to ensure sustainable benefits are achieved.', ' • Perform client data verification, due diligence checks and risk assessments', 'Harborside 5', 'Jared Ferrato', ' • Organize and facilitate business analysis meetings, writing meeting minutes', ' • Guiding other BFAs in the review and analysis of requirements and functional specifications to ensure quality of deliverables', ' • Advanced Excel, Access and Power Point expertise', ' • Review and advise on KYC recommendations', ' • Strong analytical skills with the ability to capture, sort and organize large sets of data into meaningful analysis', 'Location- NYC (remote until further notice)', '\xa0', ' • Prior experience and subject matter expert in Client Lifecycle / KYC', 'T: 201.946.1777 ext. 4005', 'jferrato@LenmarIT.com', ' • Be the liaison between the business units, technology teams and support teams.', ' • Collaborate with developers and subject matter experts to establish the technical vision and analyze trade-offs between usability and performance needs', ' • Verify, organize and obtain validation and approvals for requirements', '185 Hudson St, Suite 1440', ' • Perform Impact Analysis for Business Requirements, determine requirement assumptions and constraints', ' • Perform analysis for integration between the existing information systems', 'Client Offboarding – Business Analyst for NYC Investment Bank', ' Skills & Qualifications:', 'Senior Recruiter- Lenmar Consulting, Inc.', ' Key Responsibilities:', 'Length- 6 months to start', 'Jersey City, NJ 07311', ' • Responses to program / cross-workstream data queries', ' This role is a PM/BFA for the Client Account Lifecycle Offboarding function within KYC Operations, based in US supporting the global team.']

['', 'Develop a clear understanding of business-related data and apply analytic knowledge to high-priority challenges across all functional areas.', 'Knowledge, Skills and Experience:', 'Be informed and aware of contemporary and emerging technical solutions related to supply chain planning and look for opportunities where these should be deployed.', 'High level of attention to detail with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, adjusting priorities as needed to meet deadlines.', 'Primary Responsibilities:', 'Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain, Engineering, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics or a related business field preferred.', 'Develop a clear understanding of business-related data and apply analytic knowledge to high-priority challenges across all functional areas.Transform data into actionable insights. Design and conduct complex ad-hoc analyses with a high degree of independence.Develop and automate reports, dashboards, decision support, and any other analysis needed to support global business.Be informed and aware of contemporary and emerging technical solutions related to supply chain planning and look for opportunities where these should be deployed.Prepare and present effective presentations to convey complex topics to system users as well as to key business leaders.', 'Reporting to the Director of Analytics, this role will be responsible for providing analytic support to the business as a part of the Enterprise Data & Analytics Team at Apex Tool Group. ', '5+ years’ experience in roles that required in-depth use of analytical techniques applied in a supply chain environment.', 'Strong, hands-on experience with SAP in a supply chain environment is preferred. Experience with other big-ERP systems will be considered.', 'The location for this role is flexible, with the understanding that the position will involve some travel and work outside of normal business hours to support global teams in their local time zones. Travel is not expected to exceed 10% on a normal basis. Preferred home locations include ATG offices in Charlotte (NC), Lexington (near Colombia, SC), Sparks (near Baltimore, MD), or Apex (near Raleigh/Durham, NC).', 'Prepare and present effective presentations to convey complex topics to system users as well as to key business leaders.', 'Excellent relationship management with the ability to work effectively across business units and functions within a matrixed organization.', 'Outstanding presentation skills and the ability to express complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.', 'Develop and automate reports, dashboards, decision support, and any other analysis needed to support global business.', 'The selected candidate will work closely with business stakeholders to employ analytical skills and drive data based decision making; fostering a data driven culture within Apex Tool Group. This includes enhancing the distribution of data through report building, supporting business decisions by performing statistical analysis, and streamlining business activities through robotic process automation.', 'Advanced proficiency with Tableau is preferred but strong experience with other data visualization programs will be considered.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain, Engineering, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics or a related business field preferred.5+ years’ experience in roles that required in-depth use of analytical techniques applied in a supply chain environment.Advanced proficiency with Tableau is preferred but strong experience with other data visualization programs will be considered.Experience with scripting and automation through programs like Alteryx and/or languages such as Python, R, Visual Basic, or Powershell is preferred but not required.High level of attention to detail with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, adjusting priorities as needed to meet deadlines.Strong, hands-on experience with SAP in a supply chain environment is preferred. Experience with other big-ERP systems will be considered.Excellent relationship management with the ability to work effectively across business units and functions within a matrixed organization.Outstanding presentation skills and the ability to express complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.Must be willing to travel (estimated 10%), including internationally.', 'Experience with scripting and automation through programs like Alteryx and/or languages such as Python, R, Visual Basic, or Powershell is preferred but not required.', 'We are currently looking to fill a role supporting our Sales & Marketing functions.', 'Transform data into actionable insights. job_title: Senior Analyst, Enterprise Reporting & Business Intelligence
job_text: ['', 'Deep knowledge of one or more of the leading Enterprise Business Intelligence tools (e.g., Tableau, Looker, QlikView, Power BI)', 'Strong training, presentation, and documentation skills', ' Partner with various business units to identify and understand their pain points, business needs, and process gaps, as well as partner with Data Engineering to translate business needs into actionable requirements Approve analytic validation and application of data transformations to accurately promote recommendations into business processes Drive Looker adoption across our global lines of business Establish the team as subject matter experts in data visualization across departments Train end-users on Looker and how to translate raw data into actionable reports Investigate and evaluate reports. Automate these reports into self-refreshing Looker dashboards ', 'Establish the team as subject matter experts in data visualization across departments', ' 5+ years of professional experience using data analysis and visualization to influence executive-level decision making in consulting or other applicable backgrounds (analytical, problem-solving, conceptual, client-facing, collaborative) strongly preferred Must be proficient in translating business questions into actionable requirements, analyses, and visualizations Strong interpersonal, communication, and collaboration skills are required to become a trusted partner to business leaders, which includes being able to quickly isolate and prioritize the main issues and supporting drivers of those issues Must be able to influence and drive action without direct reporting responsibility Deep knowledge of one or more of the leading Enterprise Business Intelligence tools (e.g., Tableau, Looker, QlikView, Power BI) Proficiency in SQL is required. ['Key Responsibilities', '  Physical Requirements', ' ', 'Gather critical information from meetings from various stakeholders and produce useful reports', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to climb stairs, stand, sit; talk, hear and use hands and fingers to operate a computer and telephone keyboard', 'Evaluate multiple sources of data, anticipate analysis requirements, and identify areas for improvement', 'As we navigate these unprecedented times and continue to expand interactions digitally, our team is continuing to grow!  We are looking for a Senior Marketing Analyst with a love for data visualization and generating actionable insights from raw data. We are currently working from home due to the stay in place order so this role will begin remotely.
