job_title: Data Architect (modeling, analyst and P&C knowledgeable)
job_text: ['Contribute to the definition of standards, best practices, and methodologies for data modeling, integration, version control, solution deployment, and change management', 'IAT Recruiter:', 'IAT has an immediate opening for a Data Architect/Modeler that will be involved in the Data Management organization of IAT.\xa0 This role will work in close collaboration with business leaders, IT leaders, systems and business subject matter experts, process owners, and data stakeholders to deliver high-quality products, ensuring IAT will meet its future business strategies, objectives, and requirements and will support the ongoing maturation of data management as a practice for the organization.\xa0This role works standard business hours and can be located in Raleigh, NC, Cheshire, CT, Rolling Meadows, IL, or Naperville, IL, or remote for the right candidate.\xa0Responsibilities:', 'Perform other duties as needed', 'Identify, evaluate, and provide solution options to improve data process and data quality issues', 'Demonstrated ability to profile data from disparate sources in support of data integration activities', 'Working closely with the Principal Data Architect supporting data integration and delivery projects. This will involve source data analysis and profiling, data modeling, process design, and performing code reviews for a variety of projects related to the build-out of an enterprise data warehouse in support of business intelligence and integration services', '5+ years of successful experience in data management, data warehousing, business intelligence, data analytics within an IT organization with increasing scope of responsibilities', 'Qualifications:', 'Strong work ethic and commitment to meeting deadlines', 'Demonstrated experience in the design and building of enterprise data warehouses including data strategy, data modeling, and architecture', 'Provide technical and architectural guidance to projects and project teams to ensure that new initiatives enable effective reporting and analytics needs', 'Provide guidance to the process for integration testing and quality assurance testing of data solutions', 'To qualify, all applicants must be authorized to work in the United States', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related degreeMaster’s degree is an advantage as is a degree in a data-related field5+ years of successful experience data modeling for relational databases using data modeling software (PowerDesigner experience is a plus). Experience with dimensional modeling and/or message modeling is an advantage.5+ years of successful experience in data management, data warehousing, business intelligence, data analytics within an IT organization with increasing scope of responsibilitiesDemonstrated ability to profile data from disparate sources in support of data integration activitiesDemonstrated experience in the design and building of enterprise data warehouses including data strategy, data modeling, and architectureCore understanding of business intelligence/data warehousing technologies, methodologies, and techniques of: data discovery, data sources, presentation layer, etc., with proven experience delivering successful solutionsKnowledge of insurance industry data models/modeling relevant to the property & casualty industry is a plusExcellent oral and written communication and presentation skills, capable of presenting complex issues in a clear, concise, and persuasive manner to business and technical professionalsStrategic mindset with the ability to plan iterative steps for delivery on strategic goalsDemonstrated initiative, self-starter, with strong analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong work ethic and commitment to meeting deadlinesUnderstanding of common SDLC practices/methodologies, agile methodologiesTo qualify, all applicants must be authorized to work in the United States', '5+ years of successful experience data modeling for relational databases using data modeling software (PowerDesigner experience is a plus). Experience with dimensional modeling and/or message modeling is an advantage.', 'Working closely with the Principal Data Architect supporting data integration and delivery projects. This will involve source data analysis and profiling, data modeling, process design, and performing code reviews for a variety of projects related to the build-out of an enterprise data warehouse in support of business intelligence and integration servicesProviding guidance to ETL developers and BI resources related to the appropriate use and data quality considerationsContribute strategic and tactical thought leadership, technical expertise, and guidance to the Data Management future state architecture and capability roadmapCollaborate with Data Management, Business Intelligence team, stakeholders, and team members to define, design, build, test, deploy and support a full data warehouse environmentProvide technical and architectural guidance to projects and project teams to ensure that new initiatives enable effective reporting and analytics needsIdentify, evaluate, and provide solution options to improve data process and data quality issuesContribute to the definition of standards, best practices, and methodologies for data modeling, integration, version control, solution deployment, and change managementProvide guidance to the process for integration testing and quality assurance testing of data solutionsParticipate in Data Governance Council with the objective of continuing to improve data quality, data availability, data security, and data maturityPerform other duties as needed', 'We are proud to be an EEO/AA employer M/F/D/V. We maintain a drug-free workplace and participate in E-Verify.To be formally considered one must apply online through the IAT Career Site.Applicants should monitor their email for status updates and or requests.IAT Recruiter:Steve Morley | Senior Recruiter\xa0steve.morley@iatinsurance.comConnect\xa0 |\xa0 www.linkedin.com/in/stevemorley916', 'Collaborate with Data Management, Business Intelligence team, stakeholders, and team members to define, design, build, test, deploy and support a full data warehouse environment', 'Understanding of common SDLC practices/methodologies, agile methodologies', 'Knowledge of insurance industry data models/modeling relevant to the property & casualty industry is a plus', 'Providing guidance to ETL developers and BI resources related to the appropriate use and data quality considerations', 'Strategic mindset with the ability to plan iterative steps for delivery on strategic goals', 'Excellent oral and written communication and presentation skills, capable of presenting complex issues in a clear, concise, and persuasive manner to business and technical professionals', 'Contribute strategic and tactical thought leadership, technical expertise, and guidance to the Data Management future state architecture and capability roadmap', 'Core understanding of business intelligence/data warehousing technologies, methodologies, and techniques of: data discovery, data sources, presentation layer, etc., with proven experience delivering successful solutions', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related degreeMaster’s degree is an advantage as is a degree in a data-related field', 'Participate in Data Governance Council with the objective of continuing to improve data quality, data availability, data security, and data maturity', 'Master’s degree is an advantage as is a degree in a data-related field', 'Demonstrated initiative, self-starter, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills']

company: North American Company for Life and Health Insurance
job_text: ['', ' Proactively manage change throughout the lifecycle of the project by communicating with project team, evaluating impact, updating documentation and negotiating alternatives.', ' Writing User Stories ', ' Act as the subject matter expert and mentor other less experienced Business Analysts in using different elicitation and documentation techniques; perform mentoring on all Business Analysis activities when needed.', 'Qualifications', ' ESOP-A generous 100% company funded retirement plan', ' Lead certain ceremonies for the team', ' Ability to pick up stories and test on the back end ', ' Ability to diagram with appropriate tools for the situation and present to the project team and stakeholders', " Define the organization's goals in relationship to overall Sammons Financial Group Companies business objectives; use collaboration and investigative work to identify accurate requirements.", ' Ability to deal with complex situations holistically', ' Facilitate creation and documentation of abstract models depicting enterprise capability maturity, organizational structure and services.', ' Develop business analysis plan approach, estimates and communication plan for each assignment.', ' Ability and willingness to change in support of the best possible results for the organization', ' Great benefits including medical, dental, vision, wellness plan, charitable giving programs, education assistance… to name a few', ' Choose appropriate requirements facilitation approach based on the project and stakeholders, i.e. Brainstorming, Workshops, Focus Groups and Interviews.', ' Manage the issue log and oversee the successful escalation and assignment of issues related to business requirements delivery.', ' As a rule act as a liaison among stakeholders on large (8000 hrs effort) size projects that may have a budget up to $500,000. These projects that impact multiple business units and functions and are time critical to the organization; project s may also involve vendor relationships that must be coordinated by the business analyst.  Develop business analysis plan approach, estimates and communication plan for each assignment.  Define the organization\'s goals in relationship to overall Sammons Financial Group Companies business objectives; use collaboration and investigative work to identify accurate requirements.  Analyze Current State Processes and Systems using a variety of techniques like Dataflow Diagrams, Functional Decomposition, Interviews and Analysis of Metrics and Key Performance Indicators.  Act as the subject matter expert and mentor other less experienced Business Analysts in using different elicitation and documentation techniques; perform mentoring on all Business Analysis activities when needed.  Work closely with Business Partners/Product Owners at all levels in the organization to: proactively define business requirements, complete backlog grooming, define acceptance criteria, and collaborate with other stakeholders related to requirements.  Facilitate structured process improvement events (example - Value Stream Mapping).  Use a variety of techniques like User Stories, Use Cases, and Diagrams in requirements documentation.  Manage project scope and risks by recommending and negotiating solutions and effectively communicating with the Project Manager in a timely manner; make recommendations for product enhancements.  Define the future state related to projects for both internal and external Stakeholders and advocate on behalf of all stakeholders.  Participate in projects utilizing external consultants and being cognizant of the need for different communication styles and processes.  Facilitate creation and documentation of abstract models depicting enterprise capability maturity, organizational structure and services.  Identify project risks and coordinate with the project team and stakeholders to mitigate effectively.  Choose appropriate requirements facilitation approach based on the project and stakeholders, i.e. Brainstorming, Workshops, Focus Groups and Interviews.  Clearly define Business, Stakeholder, Solution (Functional & Non-Functional) and Transition requirements.  See projects through to implementation and follow-up with stakeholders to confirm objectives were met.  Manage the issue log and oversee the successful escalation and assignment of issues related to business requirements delivery.  Act as a partner with technical development staff and Quality Assurance to confirm understanding related to requirements; collaborate with other project members during technical design and test planning to insure overall coverage and understanding.  Act as a liaison between Business Users and IT to ensure constant communication cycle with these parties throughout the life of the project. Embrace, adapt and lead through change, fostering effective partnerships and driving effective collaboration with peers and vendor resources.  Ensure that appropriate documentation is kept current and meets all internal controls requirements related to content and approval.  Proactively manage change throughout the lifecycle of the project by communicating with project team, evaluating impact, updating documentation and negotiating alternatives.  Maintain a positive, professional, "Sammons First" attitude among team members; remain flexible and adjust to multiple tasks and circumstances; develop business analysis standards, review and edit standard operating procedures for Sammons Financial Group.  Support career development; seek industry, technology, and job related educational opportunities; increase knowledge of insurance industry and business processes by the use of training or reading material and presenting information to peers and manager; enhance and continuously upgrade technology skills and apply to daily work; seek best practices in areas of analysis and technology; improve efficiency and quality in projects and in the business analysis discipline. Responsible for issue triage to develop and begin leveraging subject matter expertise to understand broader omni-impacts; participates in review and/or reassignment of priority based on available data for complex issues. Responsible for issue assignment by identifying cross-functional partners to support the initial assignment. Responsible for issue coordination and management by providing scripted issue resolution with corrective actions to resolve the issue when it is easily identified and/or the resolution is known during triage (ex: cookie issue). This individual also has some autonomy to research and execute a solution without cross-functional dependency (ex: pricing, promotion, availability). Responsible for issue communication to close the loop with the issue submitter; participates in providing input into issue communication. Responsible for issue resolution to communicate corrective actions to resolve when the issue is easily identified/resolution is known during triage; participates in broader issue resolutions as needed (e.g., executive level issue/senior task). Participate in issue backlog management to review on-going analysis and resolutions to known issues. Responsible for issue trend monitoring to proactively monitor inbound queues/available tools for actionable changes in defined KPIs. Responsible for developing skillset for release support to represent the business/customer experience at critical decision points. Responsible for developing skillset to support the business with releases by identifying business impacts/outages, participate in demos, user acceptance testing, and accept known issues/defects when applicable. Responsible for developing skillset for business communications by learning how to document and communicate business impacts/outages/moratoriums, provide business updates on issues, and provide business updates through available communication vehicles including executive summaries, WBR and email broadcast communications. Responsible for developing skillset to support production changes to review and approve intraday/emergency/expedited changes in product with consideration of the broader omni-channel impact. Participate in weekly rotation of on-call support specific to a 24/7 plan, serving as the secondary/escalated person responsible for initial intake and triage of issues. Responsible for the operational execution of production changes within toolsets that support the operational products. Includes configuration, setup, coding and support for events, product releases, and defect remediation. Beginning to leverage subject matter expertise/deeper understanding of toolset to research and triage defects and/or optimization opportunities.', " Bachelor\\'s degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, Communications/English/Journalism, or related field 1+ year(s) experience in one or more of the following: project management, product management, business analysis, program management or product marketing 3+ years’ experience in two or more of the following: project management, product management, business analysis, program management or product marketing Ability to handle high-pressure situations and dynamic environment Excellent oral and written communication skills Demonstrated experience working cross-functionally in a large organization Excellent time-management and organization skills", ' Responsible for the operational execution of production changes within toolsets that support the operational products. Includes configuration, setup, coding and support for events, product releases, and defect remediation. ['', 'Responsibilities', 'Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance and OneMedical membership', 'With our current phase of exciting growth comes a greater demand for both quick and deep insights— and that’s where you come in. We’re looking for someone to help us connect these disparate data sources, architect scalable data models and craft compelling visualizations to allow us to deliver insights for the next level of growth. On top of regular data model creation and maintenance, you’ll support key stakeholders across Product, Engineering, among others, with the ability to glean key insights that inform business decisions for their functional area. What’s more, you’ll also invest in training end users in Looker, our main data visualization and BI tool, to help you scale your impact.', 'Our philosophy is simple. At Frame.io, we believe that working with people of different backgrounds and perspectives allows us to elevate each other and helps us build a better product for our users.', 'Competitive salary and equity', 'Improve data availability and quality to provide highly accurate, reliable access to data for the business', 'At Frame.io, we’ve built a team of world class data practitioners who are strategic, driven, passionate, and are curious skeptics who bring their unique ideas and perspectives to everything we do. Our small but mighty team is highly productive and committed to mutual support, collaboration and knowledge sharing.', 'Identify process improvements, contribute to our documentation, and share best practices with the team and our end-users', '5+ years of professional experience as an analytics engineer, data analyst, business intelligence analyst or data scientist', 'Support our growing data consumption needs to deliver quick and deep insights for our Product and Engineering stakeholders.', 'If that sounds like an exciting challenge, let’s chat!', 'Train data champions from across the organization on SQL and Looker (including LookML)', 'Deliver insights through ad hoc analyses and data extractions to resolve important business needs', 'Flexible Spending Account', 'About The Role', 'Expert knowledge of SQL and Looker (including writing LookML)', '1 paid company-wide holiday for each month in the calendar year', 'Transforming, modeling, visualizing and analyzing data at that scale isn’t an easy task, but we’re fortunate to have invested in a toolkit and processes that help support a robust analytics infrastructure.', 'Our Philosophy', 'About Frame.io', 'Benefits', 'Train end users to self-serve data requests with Looker', 'Contribute to our analytics infrastructure by continuing to build and extend on top of our data models with an eye towards performance and maintainabilityEnsure upstream product model changes integrate well with our data model; and when it doesn’t build the necessary capabilities to adjustImplement exploration tools and dashboards in Looker to help cross-functional stakeholders glean insights for their functional areaDeliver insights through ad hoc analyses and data extractions to resolve important business needsTrain data champions from across the organization on SQL and Looker (including LookML)Train end users to self-serve data requests with LookerImprove data availability and quality to provide highly accurate, reliable access to data for the businessApply software engineering best practices to the analytics workflow (ex: version control, testing)Identify process improvements, contribute to our documentation, and share best practices with the team and our end-usersStay up to date on the latest trends and tools in data/analytics engineering to help improve existing technology stack', 'Strong business acumen and product intuition', 'Ensure upstream product model changes integrate well with our data model; and when it doesn’t build the necessary capabilities to adjust', 'Stay up to date on the latest trends and tools in data/analytics engineering to help improve existing technology stack', 'Experience using any of the following software/tools strongly preferred but not required: Segment, Redshift, Snowflake, BigQuery, dbt, or Apache Airflow', '5+ years of professional experience as an analytics engineer, data analyst, business intelligence analyst or data scientistExpert knowledge of SQL and Looker (including writing LookML)Hands-on experience with data modeling and reporting in data visualization tools such as Looker, Tableau or a similar toolExcellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to a non-technical audienceHigh level of precision and attention to detailStrong business acumen and product intuitionExperience using any of the following software/tools strongly preferred but not required: Segment, Redshift, Snowflake, BigQuery, dbt, or Apache Airflow', 'Competitive salary and equityPaid parental leave for primary or secondary caregiversUnlimited PTO and designated Volunteering paid time offYearly stipend for learning and developmentMedical, Dental, Vision Insurance and OneMedical membershipFlexible Spending AccountMonthly Work from Home Stipend1 paid company-wide holiday for each month in the calendar yearAll-company week-long winter and summer breaks', 'Monthly Work from Home Stipend', 'Yearly stipend for learning and development', 'Paid parental leave for primary or secondary caregivers', 'High level of precision and attention to detail', 'We’re in an exciting period of growth and are always seeking extremely talented and passionate individuals who share our vision for helping visual content creators produce their best work.', 'Implement exploration tools and dashboards in Looker to help cross-functional stakeholders glean insights for their functional area', 'Unlimited PTO and designated Volunteering paid time off', 'Frame.io is changing the future of how videos are made by helping over 1 million creative professionals seamlessly collaborate from all over the world.', 'We’re backed by Accel, FirstMark, Insight Partners, SignalFire, Jared Leto, and a host of other amazing investors. Our market-leading product is used and loved by companies such as Turner, Disney, NASA, Snapchat, BBC, BuzzFeed, TED, Adobe, Udemy, and many more.', 'Requirements', 'All-company week-long winter and summer breaks', 'Contribute to our analytics infrastructure by continuing to build and extend on top of our data models with an eye towards performance and maintainability', 'Hands-on experience with data modeling and reporting in data visualization tools such as Looker, Tableau or a similar tool', 'Apply software engineering best practices to the analytics workflow (ex: version control, testing)', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to a non-technical audience', 'We’re seeking a talented Sr. Analytics Engineer to support our data-driven culture and our growing data consumption needs. As a software company serving more than 1 million users to date, we’re sitting on billions of rows of transactional data that powers our application, activity data captured through Segment, customer traits and communication data from a variety of marketing and sales tools, financial data from Stripe and Salesforce, and a multitude of others from which new opportunities can be unlocked.', "We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and are committed to providing all employees with a work environment that celebrates individuality and remains free from any form of discrimination and harassment. We base our employment decisions on the needs of our business, job requirements, and applicants' qualifications. In other words, we only care that you’re the best person for the job."]

job_title: Senior Compensation and HR Data Analyst
job_text: ['', 'Support the development, administration, and communication of the organization’s global compensation programs. Standard responsibilities include, but are not limited to, job evaluation, market pricing, developing/maintaining salary structures, and administering the annual compensation review process.Independently oversee or assist in the management of projects or processes such as survey participation and analysis, spot bonus recognition program, annual focal point compensation process, and internal promotions and salary adjustment cycles.Participate in compensation surveys. Compile and analyze survey data to provide recommendations regarding the competitiveness of compensation.Evaluate compensation for MSH positions to ensure external competitiveness and internal equity. Conducts cyclical pay reviews and analyses.Help to ensure proper job classification and compliance with regulatory statutes related to compensation practices.Provide guidance and recommendations to managers, HR Partners, and Talent Acquisition regarding compensation matters.Provide training and develop communications to improve the organization’s understanding of compensation.', 'Demonstrates a sense of urgency and a desire to constantly seek improvements.Ability to maintain strict confidentiality when communicating or handling sensitive employee information.Ability to prioritize and handle multiple activities at onceMust be able to discover/anticipate issues or concerns that may arise.Demonstrates intellectual curiosity and the ability to proactively research, assess, and seek solutions to problems.Demonstrates sound judgment concerning the interpretation of company policies and procedures.', 'Experience developing dashboards and using data visualization tools preferred', 'Provide guidance and recommendations to managers, HR Partners, and Talent Acquisition regarding compensation matters.', 'Main Duties and Responsibilities', 'Excellent analytic ability with strong attention to detail and accuracy', 'Collaborate with the HRIS team to manage all compensation data and processes in Workday.Enhance the performance of Workday for the compensation function. Help to improve data accuracy, create reports and dashboards, develop business processes and configure the system to meet business needs.Implement changes and enhancements, troubleshoot, and perform systems testing.', 'Participate in compensation surveys. Compile and analyze survey data to provide recommendations regarding the competitiveness of compensation.', 'Ability to maintain strict confidentiality when communicating or handling sensitive employee information.', 'Education', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills. Demonstrated ability to explain technical information to employees at all levels', 'General Compensation Support (40%)', 'Fundamental knowledge of statistics', "Provide support to the HR function in the areas of people metrics, reporting, and analytics.Use data analysis to inform business decisions, operations, processes, or programs. Conduct research and provide HR analytics to communicate business insights.Provide recommendations regarding key HR metrics and reporting to enhance the organization's HR analytical capabilities.Apply knowledge of a broad range of people-related topics such as talent acquisition, performance, learning, talent development, diversity, compensation, and retention to help diagnose and identify HR challenges.Clearly communicate findings to all levels in the organization, verbally or via presentations, graphs, infographics, or other methods.", 'Experience with HRIS reporting and systems configuration, preferably using Workday', 'Preferred: At least 2 years of direct Compensation experience', 'Demonstrates intellectual curiosity and the ability to proactively research, assess, and seek solutions to problems.', 'Support the development, administration, and communication of the organization’s global compensation programs. Standard responsibilities include, but are not limited to, job evaluation, market pricing, developing/maintaining salary structures, and administering the annual compensation review process.', 'Collaborate with the HRIS team to manage all compensation data and processes in Workday.', 'Knowledge and Skills\u200b', 'Ability to prioritize and handle multiple activities at once', 'Experience', 'Use data analysis to inform business decisions, operations, processes, or programs. Conduct research and provide HR analytics to communicate business insights.', 'Must be able to discover/anticipate issues or concerns that may arise.', 'Knowledge and Skills', '\ufeffCompetencies', 'Working knowledge of compensation practices, principles, and regulatory topics. General knowledge of HR fundamentals as a discipline.Proven track of working with Excel (formulas, pivot tables, charts, and lookups), preparing/analyzing data, and providing data insights. Experience with reporting and data analysis techniques.Fundamental knowledge of statisticsExperience developing dashboards and using data visualization tools preferredExperience with HRIS reporting and systems configuration, preferably using WorkdayExcellent oral and written communication skills. Demonstrated ability to explain technical information to employees at all levelsMust have the flexibility to work hours to meet a global employee base.Excellent analytic ability with strong attention to detail and accuracyCreative problem-solverStrong project management and coordination skills.', 'Strong project management and coordination skills.', 'Apply knowledge of a broad range of people-related topics such as talent acquisition, performance, learning, talent development, diversity, compensation, and retention to help diagnose and identify HR challenges.', 'Clearly communicate findings to all levels in the organization, verbally or via presentations, graphs, infographics, or other methods.', 'Creative problem-solver', "Provide recommendations regarding key HR metrics and reporting to enhance the organization's HR analytical capabilities.", 'Other Duties (5%)', 'Must have the flexibility to work hours to meet a global employee base.', 'Compensation HRIS Data Management (25%)', 'Location: Arlington, VA or Medford, MA', 'Required: 4 years of experience in Compensation and/or in HR analytics', 'Provide training and develop communications to improve the organization’s understanding of compensation.', 'Help to ensure proper job classification and compliance with regulatory statutes related to compensation practices.', 'Working knowledge of compensation practices, principles, and regulatory topics. General knowledge of HR fundamentals as a discipline.', 'This role uses a strong foundation in compensation and data analytics to advance Compensation initiatives and HR data insights. The Analyst will assist the Compensation Manager in developing, analyzing, implementing, and optimizing the organization’s global compensation programs. She or he will manage compensation data and processes in Workday -- ensuring data accuracy, creating reports and dashboards, and configuring the system to meet business needs. The role also supports data-driven decision making across HR by conducting research and using analytics to communicate trends and business insights.', 'Provide support to the HR function in the areas of people metrics, reporting, and analytics.', 'Perform other duties as assigned.', "Required: Bachelor's degree", 'Enhance the performance of Workday for the compensation function. Help to improve data accuracy, create reports and dashboards, develop business processes and configure the system to meet business needs.', 'Implement changes and enhancements, troubleshoot, and perform systems testing.', 'Demonstrates sound judgment concerning the interpretation of company policies and procedures.', 'HR Data Analytics (30%)', 'Independently oversee or assist in the management of projects or processes such as survey participation and analysis, spot bonus recognition program, annual focal point compensation process, and internal promotions and salary adjustment cycles.', 'Proven track of working with Excel (formulas, pivot tables, charts, and lookups), preparing/analyzing data, and providing data insights. Experience with reporting and data analysis techniques.', 'Evaluate compensation for MSH positions to ensure external competitiveness and internal equity. Conducts cyclical pay reviews and analyses.', 'Demonstrates a sense of urgency and a desire to constantly seek improvements.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Possess knowledge about cybersecurity and keep up to date with the security industry', 'Highly knowledgeable about computers, including networks, operating systems, applications, and web apps', 'Our comprehensive U.S. benefit offerings include: Health benefits, 401(k) retirement savings program with company match, etc. and at least 80 hours of vacation, as well as holiday, personal and sick time.', ' Act as project manager and hands-on resource with subject matter expertise to implement cost-effective, scalable solutions to support and maintain DOD CMMC Level 3. Develop and implement best practices, policies, and processes with respect to information security. Review order to cash manufacturing process to provide improvements around security  Partner with Compliance and IT to establish, monitor and enforce security configuration settings for IT hardware and software products employed within the organization, this includes whitelisting and blacklisting policies. job_title: Full Time : Business Analyst (Regulatory Reporting EMIR) : Dallas, TX
job_text: ['', 'Working with senior stakeholders in the project space across relevant business functions to deliver the teams global projects be responsible for the collation of business requirements and testing approach and execution for system implementation and process change for Trade and Transaction Reporting projects and wider control issues, contributing towards delivery on multiple projects', 'Collaborate with Management to ensure common standards and best practice are implemented globallyProject Responsibilities', 'TestingImplementation Collaborate with the Project team on test plan development, design test strategy and manage the UAT process ', 'Project Management Track and communicate project status to wider team and managementSkills Required (essential)Good understanding in the Regulatory Reporting processes and directives. (e.g. EMIR, MIFID II)Business AnalystChange Management experiences in the financial services sectorCreate BRDs and User storiesExcellent written and verbal communication skillsAbility to multi-task and work in a fast pace environmentDetail oriented and ability to adhere to strict timelinesProficient in MS-Excel and MS-WordSkills Required (Preferred)Experience in Regulatory Remediation work would be strongly preferredExperience in Controls and Reconciliation is highly desirableExperience In EMIR Is PreferredExperience in QA and conformance testingKnowledge of accounting and basic terminologies used in the financial services sectorKnowledge of project management and change management principlesKnowledge of MS suite of products including Power point, Share point etc.', 'Skills Required (essential)', 'Remediation work Analyses and implement change solutions to the issues raised based on priorities ', 'Controls Framework Implement reconciliation reports and additional controls to ensure the completeness, accuracy and timeliness of reported data to the regulators ', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'EMIR Regulatory Reporting work to ensure compliance with mandatory regulations for EMIR ', 'Business AnalysisRequirements, Development and QA of high priority issues identified in Regulatory reporting remit. ', 'Experience In EMIR Is Preferred', 'Working with technology partners to define the functional and technical design to support business processing requirements', 'Skills Required (Preferred)', 'Implement and improve controls and metrics required to detect and prevent issues to ensure completeness, accuracy and timeliness of these reports.Primary ResponsibilitiesThis role is for a Business AnalystThe role offers the opportunity to engage with various groups within the Firm in Operations, Finance, Risk and IT to ensure delivery of business requirements in line with various Regulatory Reporting and control framework agendas. It will also include the provision of inputs into broader functional architecture efforts and business process re-engineering initiatives within the Firm.This is a challenging and rewarding role offering the candidate the opportunity to work on a varied portfolio of change. The candidate will need to be able to understand and articulate the differences between various financial products and their related operational processes and technologies, have an appreciation of the wider regulatory landscape and define, identify and deliver strategic solutions for controls, risk management and problem resolution. The candidate will also need to be able to work with and get the best from all levels of the organisation.Primary Responsibilities']

job_title: Cards Business Analyst - C71789 5.2 Beaverton, OR
job_text: ['', ' Lead a team of Junior BAs, Testers.', ' Conducting workshop with IT/business/operations team in order to understand the AS-IS processes / requirements and suggest TO-BE processes/requirements.', 'Beaverton, OR', ' To understand the Business requirements from different business stakeholders and convert them into System Requirements in the form of User Stories and Acceptance Criteria.', ' Defining the analysis approach for projects, ensuring they meet Capgemini and customer needs for successful delivery.', ' Review analysis documents - BRD, FSD, User Stories and take stakeholder sign-off from client.', ' Experience of working in an Agile Environment.', ' Business Requirement assessment and document business processes, flows, use cases and business requirements and help in solution development and deployment.', ' Proven Domain and Business Functions expertise in Cards domain.', ' Interact with business/SMEs/Technical stakeholders, steer workshop for requirement elicitation, system impact analysis.', ' Excellent communication and customer management skills.', ' Proven Business and Technical expertise in Credit card and banking domain (BFSI) with Hands-on experience in card management systems FDR Omaha.', ' In depth knowledge of cards issuing line of business.', ' In depth knowledge of cards issuing line of business. Conducting workshop with IT/business/operations team in order to understand the AS-IS processes / requirements and suggest TO-BE processes/requirements. Business Requirement assessment and document business processes, flows, use cases and business requirements and help in solution development and deployment. Work in cross functional team environment and liaise between the development / testing teams and the client in order to cascade the requirements. Defining the analysis approach for projects, ensuring they meet Capgemini and customer needs for successful delivery. Interact with business/SMEs/Technical stakeholders, steer workshop for requirement elicitation, system impact analysis. Lead a team of Junior BAs, Testers. Review analysis documents - BRD, FSD, User Stories and take stakeholder sign-off from client. Review test strategy, test specifications ,assist in SIT and provide UAT support. To understand the Business requirements from different business stakeholders and convert them into System Requirements in the form of User Stories and Acceptance Criteria. Proven Domain and Business Functions expertise in Cards domain. Proven Business and Technical expertise in Credit card and banking domain (BFSI) with Hands-on experience in card management systems FDR Omaha. Excellent communication and customer management skills. Prior experience of working in FDR Omaha platform is a big plus. Experience of working in an Agile Environment.', ' Review test strategy, test specifications ,assist in SIT and provide UAT support.', ' Prior experience of working in FDR Omaha platform is a big plus.', ' Work in cross functional team environment and liaise between the development / testing teams and the client in order to cascade the requirements.', 'Cards Business Analyst ', 'Required Skills']

['', 'Required experience/education:', 'Our Firm', 'Work with the Director of Enterprise Data Governance and their team, as well as other business leaders on the near and long-term roadmap for two key capabilities within American Century’s data and analytics workstreams:Data Mastery and Data CurationSelf-Service Data AnalyticsCultivate an expertise on the wants and priorities of Data Owners and consumers within the two workstreams above.Educate partners in the concepts of data governance and master data and influence / encourage their support and adoption of these data capabilities .Work with Data Owners to define and have accountability to prioritize features and story backlogs that build out these capabilities, including: Requirements gathering and translation of the product vision from feature(s) into stories with clearly defined acceptance criteria. Data ingestion and output design. Internal and External data sources and integration points. Tools and technology enabling data science and business intelligence teams. Implementation strategies and planningOwn a scrum team backlog and work day-to-day with the team to lead the delivery and execution of prioritized features and story backlogs.Coordinate dependencies with other Product Owners when deliverables are dependent on another team for completion.Participate in Delivery Team demonstrations to ensure solutions are implemented that meet the intent of the vision and strategy.Serve as the knowledge resource for questions from the development team.Maintain an in-depth knowledge of all appropriate data sources and stay ahead of changes.', "Bachelor's degree in relevant field (e.g. economics, finance, computer science, mathematics) some combination of business and technology education is highly preferred or have related work experience.Minimum of 3+ years’ experience in business, engineering, technology and/or consulting.Knowledge of Agile development methodologies and business/systems analysis.Demonstrable experience with investment data sets (security master, holdings, portfolio analytics) and an ability to mine such data and produce analyses.Strong experimental approach to drive innovation in a fast-paced environment amidst uncertainty.Strong analytical, critical thinking, negotiating and problem-solving skills.Strong written/verbal communication skills with superb attention to detail, and the ability to influence others using your unique leadership skills.Solid aptitude in learning new tools and technologies to work optimally in a rapid growth environment.Ability to work on assignments independently, using a high level of judgment and initiative in resolving problems and developing recommendations.", 'Maintain an in-depth knowledge of all appropriate data sources and stay ahead of changes.', 'The Analyst will interact and collaborate with Business leaders, Product Managers and Product Owners in Investment Management, Investment Operations, and Global Products along with the development team(s), business users and other partners to understand the vision for the business and reduce risk. You will also own and maintain a product backlog that ultimately seeks to deliver data and business solutions.', 'Knowledge of Agile development methodologies and business/systems analysis.', 'We have an Enterprise Data Senior Analyst (Product Owner) opportunity that will be a member of our innovative Enterprise Data team. You will play a key role in helping to drive forward data and analytics strategic objectives. In this role, you will support efforts to use data to increase productivity and encourage stakeholders throughout the enterprise to adopt and embrace the concepts of data governance, master data, and analytics using an enterprise data platform. Other primary responsibilities are to act in the role of product owner and define and prioritize the product backlog for various investment data domains.', 'Financial Services experience', 'American Century Investments believes all individuals are entitled to equal employment opportunity and advancement opportunities without regard to race, religious creed, color, sex, national origin, ancestry, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital status, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age for individuals forty years of age and older, military and veteran status, sexual orientation, and any other basis protected by applicable federal, state and local laws. ACI does not discriminate or adopt any policy that discriminates against an individual or any group of individuals on any of these bases.', 'Participate in Delivery Team demonstrations to ensure solutions are implemented that meet the intent of the vision and strategy.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Good understanding of data mastering, knowledge of ETL development and ability to prepare technical specifications will be very favorable.', 'Work with Data Owners to define and have accountability to prioritize features and story backlogs that build out these capabilities, including: Requirements gathering and translation of the product vision from feature(s) into stories with clearly defined acceptance criteria. Data ingestion and output design. Internal and External data sources and integration points. Tools and technology enabling data science and business intelligence teams. Implementation strategies and planning', 'Enterprise Data Senior Analyst (Product Owner) ', 'Headquartered in Kansas City, Mo., we also have offices located in New York; London; Hong Kong; Frankfurt; Sydney; Los Angeles; and Mountain View, Calif. (Silicon Valley).', 'Minimum of 3+ years’ experience in business, engineering, technology and/or consulting.', 'Comfort and expertise with investment data sets (security master, holdings, portfolio analytics) and an ability to mine such data and produce analyses.\xa0', "Bachelor's degree in relevant field (e.g. economics, finance, computer science, mathematics) some combination of business and technology education is highly preferred or have related work experience.", 'Privately controlled and independent, we focus solely on investment management. This empowers us to align our decisions with client expectations and concentrate on their long-term money management needs.', 'Are you interested in an Analyst role that includes product owner responsibility? Do you have experience working with data sets within the financial services industry? We may have the opportunity you have been waiting for!', 'Our culture of winning behaviors exemplifies our dedication to clients every single day. Delivering investment results enables us to distribute over 40% of our dividends—more than $1.7 billion — to the Stowers Institute for Medical Research, a 500-person, non-profit basic biomedical research organization with a controlling interest in American Century Investments. Our dividend payments provide ongoing financial support for the Institute’s work of uncovering the causes, treatments and prevention of life-threatening diseases, like cancer.', 'Strong analytical, critical thinking, negotiating and problem-solving skills.', 'American Century Investments® is a leading global asset manager focused on delivering investment results and building long-term client relationships while supporting research that can improve human health and save lives. Founded in 1958, the firm’s 1,400 employees serve financial professionals, institutions, corporations and individual investors, offering a wide range of investment strategies across a variety of investment disciplines.', 'We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.', 'For more information, please visit americancentury.com.', 'Data Mastery and Data Curation', 'Demonstrable experience with investment data sets (security master, holdings, portfolio analytics) and an ability to mine such data and produce analyses.', 'Strong experimental approach to drive innovation in a fast-paced environment amidst uncertainty.', 'Strong written/verbal communication skills with superb attention to detail, and the ability to influence others using your unique leadership skills.', 'Financial Services experienceSAFe Product Owner certificationScaled Agile (SAFe) experienceComfort and expertise with investment data sets (security master, holdings, portfolio analytics) and an ability to mine such data and produce analyses.\xa0Good understanding of data mastering, knowledge of ETL development and ability to prepare technical specifications will be very favorable.', 'Educate partners in the concepts of data governance and master data and influence / encourage their support and adoption of these data capabilities .', 'Solid aptitude in learning new tools and technologies to work optimally in a rapid growth environment.', 'Own a scrum team backlog and work day-to-day with the team to lead the delivery and execution of prioritized features and story backlogs.', 'Self-Service Data Analytics', 'Coordinate dependencies with other Product Owners when deliverables are dependent on another team for completion.', 'Ability to work on assignments independently, using a high level of judgment and initiative in resolving problems and developing recommendations.', 'Location: Open to remote worker', 'Preferred: ', 'Scaled Agile (SAFe) experience', 'Cultivate an expertise on the wants and priorities of Data Owners and consumers within the two workstreams above.', 'SAFe Product Owner certification', 'Work with the Director of Enterprise Data Governance and their team, as well as other business leaders on the near and long-term roadmap for two key capabilities within American Century’s data and analytics workstreams:', 'We are committed to providing institutional-quality, actively managed solutions with a performance-centered mindset. Our expertise spans global equity, global value equity, disciplined equity, multi-asset strategies, global fixed income, alternatives and ETFs.', 'Serve as the knowledge resource for questions from the development team.']

job_title: Customer Success Specialist [business analyst exp required]
job_text: ['', 'Delivering responsive customer service using our proven frameworks', 'We enjoy:\xa0We like what we do and we want you to love your job too. Learn more about\xa0The Responsive Method, our company\xa0values, and the generous\xa0benefits\xa0we offer.', 'If this sounds appealing, we would love to hear from you. (A real human reviews every application.)', 'Guiding customers from initial demo to active subscription, through procurement, legal, and security processes', 'Our customers', "We are experts:\xa0We do not hire sales or support people at Aha! — our Customer Success team is only comprised of former product, IT, project, and marketing managers.We act with urgency:\xa0We respond to customers' requests as quickly as we can. Because when we do, we have the best chance of creating the most value for customers and ourselves.We serve:\xa0We work with the world's most innovative and well-known companies and they trust us to guide them to build products that their customers love.We collaborate: We have no tolerance for drama. We celebrate clear communication, effort, and teamwork. We use Slack for internal team communication and GoToMeeting for team and customer video calls. (Email? Rarely.)We guide product:\xa0We bring our customer's requirements to our product team and define our own efficient processes and systems.We enjoy:\xa0We like what we do and we want you to love your job too. Learn more about\xa0The Responsive Method, our company\xa0values, and the generous\xa0benefits\xa0we offer.", 'We show customers what is possible with our software in a consultative way — from leading demos and answering customer requests to sharing product management best practices. Your responsibilities will include:', 'We act with urgency:', 'Helping customers integrate Aha! with their existing tools (e.g. development systems)', 'We collaborate', 'Your work at Aha!', 'Delivering responsive customer service using our proven frameworksLeading demos for new customers and new teamsSharing best practices for setting strategy, capturing ideas, prioritizing work, and creating visual roadmapsHelping customers integrate Aha! with their existing tools (e.g. development systems)Guiding customers from initial demo to active subscription, through procurement, legal, and security processesSharing customer feedback internallyTesting new product functionality as neededSetting an example for newer team members who are learning to lead demos, share best practices, and help customers with integrations', 'Leading demos for new customers and new teams', 'We are building a\xa0distributed team, and you can work from anywhere in\xa0the United States or Canada\xa0for this role. We offer generous salary, equity,\xa0benefits, and a profit-sharing program.', 'We are experts:', 'Setting an example for newer team members who are learning to lead demos, share best practices, and help customers with integrations', "Our collective experience gives us the skills to meet customers where they are, internalize how they work (because we've been there, done that), and confidently guide them to achieve their best. And because we are always curious, we love learning from our customers along our journey together.", "We act with urgency:\xa0We respond to customers' requests as quickly as we can. Because when we do, we have the best chance of creating the most value for customers and ourselves.", 'Our Customer Success team is an all-remote group spread across multiple time zones so we can work closely with customers when they need us.', 'We enjoy:\xa0', 'Your experience', "We guide product:\xa0We bring our customer's requirements to our product team and define our own efficient processes and systems.", 'Sharing customer feedback internally', 'Your favorite part of working on new products is delivering real value to customers. You enjoy interacting with your team and customers in a consultative way. Showcasing advanced technology to sophisticated customers energizes you. Applying deep curiosity to new challenges comes naturally, and you persist until you can clearly see the most efficient path to full resolution. You are happiest when you are continually learning and working with a team of high achievers like yourself. And you write exceptionally well.', 'We collaborate: We have no tolerance for drama. We celebrate clear communication, effort, and teamwork. We use Slack for internal team communication and GoToMeeting for team and customer video calls. (Email? Rarely.)', 'Sharing best practices for setting strategy, capturing ideas, prioritizing work, and creating visual roadmaps', "Aha! is the world's #1 roadmap software. We help more than\xa05,000\xa0companies build lovable products and be happy doing it. Our company is self-funded, profitable, and has been entirely remote since we started in 2013.", 'We are experts:\xa0We do not hire sales or support people at Aha! — our Customer Success team is only comprised of former product, IT, project, and marketing managers.', 'We serve:\xa0', "We serve:\xa0We work with the world's most innovative and well-known companies and they trust us to guide them to build products that their customers love.", 'Our team', 'Testing new product functionality as needed', 'We guide product:', 'You lead product definition and delivery at a growing technology company. You help launch new functionality via a well-defined go-to-market process. You thrive in a fast-paced environment where launches happen often — not once or twice a year.', "We serve the world's most innovative companies. They are building revolutionary new experiences for their customers and move fast. They expect us to do the same and to help them develop best practices for product development. Our software is methodology agnostic, which means we need to be experts in the agile, scrum, kanban, SAFe, and hybrid approaches that our customers depend on."]

['', ' Position is for the development and application lead of a Teradata based platform that supports capital modeling and validation. The position requires someone with the unique combination of data and development skills, who has the ability to understand the complex nature of risk / capital systems. The individual will be leading and working with other members of a small Agile team and will be responsible for the development of and application management / level-3 support of Teradata SQL and Unix Shell Scripts. The individual will be expected to perform some analysis in support of development, test, and production activities. Individual will be expected to do data modeling / analyst activities (data mapping, data feeds analysis / profiling, data transformation definition, etc.) as needed, and to work with line of business analysts and quants to understand / capture new requirements and to conduct user acceptance testing. Person will be expected to coordinate with Dev-Ops team on releasing items into production and for oversight of non-production environments. The position requires 5-7 years of applicable experience. The individual should have Teradata development experience and will need to demonstrate SQL / technical skills. Aspects of the platform will be migrating to Hadoop over the next 1-3 years, so familiarity with Hadoop architecture and develop experience is a strong plus. Alternatively, someone with Hadoop development experience and a solid working knowledge of large data relational databases (i.e., Teradata, Oracle-Exadata, etc.) could be successful in the role. The ideal candidate will have an understanding of capital risk (retail bank risk, credit risk, or market risk) and have an understanding of financial theory. ', 'Job Description', ' Teradata programming and release experience RDBMS (Oracle, Netezza, SQL Server, etc.) knowledge for SQL code development Basic Unix OS skills and Shell scripting; Agile methodology; JIRA or alternative ', 'Teradata programming and release experience', ' Python or Java development and release experience ETL experience Exposure to data analytic tools / languages Experience with BIG DATA source control management (e.g., Bitbucket) or job scheduling (e.g., Autosys) Experience with Hadoop platform is a plus Experience working with data scientists or analytical business users will be beneficial', 'Experience with BIG DATA source control management (e.g., Bitbucket) or job scheduling (e.g., Autosys)', 'Desired Skills', 'Experience working with data scientists or analytical business users will be beneficial', 'Position is for the development and application lead of a Teradata based platform that supports capital modeling and validation. The individual will be leading and working with other members of a small Agile team and will be responsible for the development of and application management / level-3 support of Teradata SQL and Unix Shell Scripts. Individual will be expected to do data modeling / analyst activities (data mapping, data feeds analysis / profiling, data transformation definition, etc.) as needed, and to work with line of business analysts and quants to understand / capture new requirements and to conduct user acceptance testing. Person will be expected to coordinate with Dev-Ops team on releasing items into production and for oversight of non-production environments. The position requires 5-7 years of applicable experience. The individual should have Teradata development experience and will need to demonstrate SQL / technical skills. Aspects of the platform will be migrating to Hadoop over the next 1-3 years, so familiarity with Hadoop architecture and develop experience is a strong plus. Alternatively, someone with Hadoop development experience and a solid working knowledge of large data relational databases (i.e., Teradata, Oracle-Exadata, etc.) could be successful in the role. The ideal candidate will have an understanding of capital risk (retail bank risk, credit risk, or market risk) and have an understanding of financial theory.', 'Required Skills', 'Basic Unix OS skills and Shell scripting; Agile methodology; JIRA or alternative', 'Exposure to data analytic tools / languages', 'Python or Java development and release experience', 'ETL experience', 'RDBMS (Oracle, Netezza, SQL Server, etc.) knowledge for SQL code development', 'Experience with Hadoop platform is a plus']

job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities', 'Proficiency in R, STATA, Python, and/or R Console.', 'Qualifications', 'Conduct initial reviews of Annual Budget Reviews (ABRs) submissions by partners and other performance reporting documents from partners, flagging those with significant weaknesses and/or complexities of the projects involved, require additional review and follow-up; clear ABR summaries of conclusions for P3; participate in ABR sessions or other meetings on M&E and document relevant M&E information in such sessions, at the direction of the P3 Director and/or Senior Program M&E Specialist.', 'Excellent skills in Excel spreadsheet development and maintenance.', 'Manage ACE M&E database, including tracking data entry by partners, conducting data quality checks, and generating reports on data trends with graphics.', 'Prior experience in ACE-assisted countries (Balkans, Eurasia, and Central Asia Republics) desirable.Experience supporting M&E contracts for Department of State and/or USAID missions with an implementing partner.Proficiency in R, STATA, Python, and/or R Console.', 'Minimum Requirements:', 'Master’s degree plus 5-8 years of relevant work experience in decision-makers.', 'About The Position', 'Demonstrated experience managing M&E databases and creating data visualizations in software such as Tableau.', 'Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively in English, both orally and in writing, generally and on technical subjects.', 'Prior experience in ACE-assisted countries (Balkans, Eurasia, and Central Asia Republics) desirable.', follow-up actions and resubmissions listed in ABRs’ Summaries of Conclusions (SOCs), alerting the P3 Director and Senior Program M&E Specialist to pending milestones and maintaining contact with such partners in regard to the fulfillments of the actions.Some international travel may be required (~10%).Other duties as assigned.', 'Coordinate ACE input into annual reporting on EUR JRS indicators assigned to ACE.', 'Master’s degree plus 5-8 years of relevant work experience in implementing enterprise-wide program monitoring systems covering the projects and programs of multiple development entities, with an emphasis on monitoring effectiveness outcome indicators for senior decision-makers.Demonstrated experience managing M&E databases and creating data visualizations in software such as meetings on M&E, including the evaluation community of practice and M&E events held by the Officer of the Director of Foreign Assistance and the Budget and Planning Bureau.', 'Some international Performance Trackers, and delivery of training under the direction of the P3 director and/or Senior Program M&E Specialist.', 'Must currently hold a SECRET-level clearance or above.', 'Experience supporting M&E contracts for Department of State and/or USAID missions with an implementing partner.', 'Research third party data on ACE’s country transition metrics, which are mostly open-source ['', 'o Write/maintain functional documentation and specifications for programmers', 'GIS Department', 'Commitment to the highest ethical standards and willingness to adhere to Faurecia’s Code of Ethics and Code of Management.', 'Solid project management skills.', 'As an integral part of your responsibilities, you will work directly with the business function management, functional Key Users, and GIS project teams to identify and resolve various business conditions. Your experiences with ASAP Methodologies will provide you with an opportunity to offer continuous improvement ideas to our project teams, business unit leaders and end-users.', 'o Ensures third level support after the plant launch phase', 'The main duties of the role: ·', 'FCS Manufacturing Business Analyst', 'The ability to travel in order to meet the project implementation schedule is a requirement.', 'Extensive experience (3+ years) with the SAP solution.', 'Excellent analytical, mathematical, and creative problem-solving skills.', 'Solid listening and interpersonal skills.', 'Excellent understanding of the organization’s goals and objectives.', 'o Support the plants and support functions in developing SAP functional expertise o Assist in providing user training during support activities', 'SAP expertise and system implementation:', 'Function support on the system:', 'Experience in and understanding of automotive business environments.', 'As a Business Analyst supporting the Manufacturing functions, you will leverage your direct experience with SAP to support our current North American SAP installations, as well as support of new business requirements.', 'Travel 5-10% (approximately)', "This job is an excellent opportunity to implement one's functional skills at the service of a project aiming at the improvement of the processes and assisting with supporting a global ERP, and thus advantageously to develop a dual competency, technique and functional. With a strong international dimension, this position requires strong functional experience backed with a solid foundation in SAP fundamentals.", '\xa0', 'College diploma or university degree in the field of business administration, computer science, accounting, or management information systems or equivalent experience.Proven experience in overseeing the support of SAP software solutions.Extensive experience (3+ years) with the SAP solution.A working knowledge of EDI and related experience would be beneficial.Solid project management skills.Excellent analytical, mathematical, and creative problem-solving skills.Excellent understanding of the organization’s goals and objectives.Solid written and oral communication skills.Solid listening and interpersonal skills.Ability to communicate ideas in both technical and user-friendly language.Highly self motivated and directed.Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.Strong customer service orientation.Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.Experience in and understanding of automotive business environments.Ability to travel (average 30%, up to 50%) and rent vehicles. Travel will done primarily within North America (U.S.A, Canada, and Mexico).Commitment to the highest ethical standards and willingness to adhere to Faurecia’s Code of Ethics and Code of Management.Travel 5-10% (approximately)', 'Strong customer service orientation.', 'College diploma or university degree in the field of business administration, computer science, accounting, or management information systems or equivalent experience.', 'Highly self motivated and directed.', 'Our\xa0GIS Department\xa0(Group Information Systems) is looking for an\xa0FCS Manufacturing Business Analyst\xa0to be based at\xa0Auburn Hills, Michigan\xa0or\xa0Columbus, Indiana\xa0facility.', 'Solid written and oral communication skills.', 'This would be an excellent position for someone who has been a Power-User of SAP in a manufacturing environment, as the position will require close cooperation and collaboration with the business users to analyze, identify, and offer corrective actions for sites which are in need of enhanced support activities. Solid experience with the MM/PP/SD modules is necessary to understand and support our global automotive business model.', 'Faurecia is an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'IT support :', 'The ideal candidate will have/be:', 'Ability to communicate ideas in both technical and user-friendly language.', 'Auburn Hills, Michigan', 'New trends and expectations are reshaping the automotive industry. Inspired by the exciting new challenges associated with this revolution, Faurecia anticipates the future of mobility developing cutting-edge solutions for smart life on board and sustainable mobility. If you’re willing to contribute and create value for tomorrow’s cleaner and smarter mobility, Faurecia is the place to be.', 'A working knowledge of EDI and related experience would be beneficial.', 'Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.', 'o Assist with rollout of new domain functionality', 'Columbus, Indiana', 'Ability to travel (average 30%, up to 50%) and rent vehicles. ', 'Salesforce.com certification and/or Scaled Agile Certification and/or Green Belt Certification.', 'Experience with JIRA.', 'In depth, hands-on knowledge and experience with at least one industry standard CRM system; preferably Salesforce.com.', 'About Cox', 'Experience as a Salesforce.com Product Owner CRM Sales functionalities including Customer Data Hub, Customer Data Hierarchy, Customer Segmentation, Lead Management, Account Management, External List Management, Personalization, Customer lifetime value, Omni-channel CRM programs, and Opportunity Management, Contract and Contact Management.', 'Experience in the telecommunications industry.', 'Manage Scoring (approving) and claiming processes with Business and Technology stakeholders to review and refine business requirements and use cases to ensure they are clear, concise and traceable; and to ensure business requirements will be satisfied by the appropriate teams / applications.', 'Knowledge and understanding of Cox Business internal sales order systems: ICOMS, OPTIX, WATTS, SERV, etc.', 'Knowledge sharing and mentoring of lower level team members is customary', 'business that are less connected to the situation and/or are less technically- ', 'Experience in full life cycle implementation (requirements gathering, process design, configuration, functional design, testing, conversion, and deployment) of CRM and SFA systems.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Information Systems or a related field. MBA a plus. In depth, hands-on knowledge and experience with Salesforce.com. Hands-on experience with CRM / SFA solutions implementation, including design, project planning, and execution. Experience as a Salesforce.com Product Owner CRM Sales functionalities including Customer Data Hub, Customer Data Hierarchy, Customer Segmentation, Lead Management, Account Management, External List Management, Personalization, Customer lifetime value, Omni-channel CRM programs, and Opportunity Management, Contract and Contact Management. Salesforce.com certification and/or Scaled Agile Certification and/or Green Belt Certification. Experience in creating test cases and user testing.  Experience in B2B marketing and sales process. Experience in the telecommunications industry. Experience in Cloud CRM products/technologies. Experience with Agile methodologies. Experience with Visio and/or iGrafx. Experience with JIRA. ', 'Consult with internal customers, cross-functional team members and external vendors to capture agreed-upon business objectives and processes to define system requirements ', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'Demonstrated ability to multi-task, work under pressure, and think analytically. ', 'Conduct SRQ reviews with project stakeholders and document consumers to ensure completeness and adherence to business requirements ', 'Excellent interpersonal, leadership, presentation, and collaborative skills to work effectively with teams throughout organization.', 'Identifies risks/pitfalls and articulates possible options', 'Provide status reporting for project progress, issues, dependencies and risks ', 'Knowledge of the business may be deep in one functional area with broad understanding of other functional areas.', 'Experience with Visio and/or iGrafx.', 'Travel: ', 'Schedule: ', 'Job Level: ', 'Experience in Cloud CRM products/technologies.', 'Provide BA support for software testing and debugging plans to ensure requirements are met ', 'Exceptional business acumen and story-telling skills - the ability to communicate an insight to be understood easily and to drive action.', 'Sphere of relationship and influence is within team, with key stakeholders & with senior management', 'Identify project stakeholders, risks and benefits of alternate designs; document assumptions; assess project impact of system changes to users, internal and external customers ', 'May facilitate meetings', ' 5+ years’ relevant experience in B2B sales environment. Prior experience in Sales functionalities - Lead Management, Account Management, Opportunity Management, Contact Management, External List Management, Personalization, and Customer Lifetime Value. In depth, hands-on knowledge and experience with at least one industry standard CRM system; preferably Salesforce.com. Knowledge and understanding of Cox Business internal sales order systems: ICOMS, OPTIX, WATTS, SERV, etc. Manage, follow and adhere to the long/short term product roadmap for CRM in conjunction with functional leads. Experience in full life cycle implementation (requirements gathering, process design, configuration, functional design, testing, conversion, and deployment) of CRM and SFA systems. Ability to grasp and explain complicated subject matter to others across the  business that are less connected to the situation and/or are less technically-  oriented. Exceptional business acumen and story-telling skills - the ability to communicate an insight to be understood easily and to drive action. Excellent interpersonal, leadership, presentation, and collaborative skills to work effectively with teams throughout organization. Demonstrated ability to multi-task, work under pressure, and think analytically.  ', 'Ability to grasp and explain complicated subject matter to others across the ', 'Prior experience in Sales functionalities - Lead Management, Account Management, Opportunity Management, Contact Management, External List Management, Personalization, and Customer Lifetime Value.', 'About Cox Communications', 'Requisition Number: ', 'Develop System Requirements (SRQs), including process flows and use cases', 'oriented.', 'Experience in B2B marketing and sales process.', 'Update and map SRQs to Business Requirements in the Requirements Traceability Matrix (RTM) ', 'Primary Location: ', ' Facilitate creation of Business Requirements following a agile approach, or using the Business Process and Analysis (BPA) methodology as determined by the project sponsor Manage Scoring (approving) and claiming processes with Business and Technology stakeholders to review and refine business requirements and use cases to ensure they are clear, concise and traceable; and to ensure business requirements will be satisfied by the appropriate teams / applications. Identify project stakeholders, risks and benefits of alternate designs; document assumptions; assess project impact of system changes to users, internal and external customers  Develop System Requirements (SRQs), including process flows and use cases Conduct SRQ reviews with project stakeholders and document consumers to ensure completeness and adherence to business requirements  Consult with internal customers, cross-functional team members and external vendors to capture agreed-upon business objectives and processes to define system requirements  Update and map SRQs to Business Requirements in the Requirements Traceability Matrix (RTM)  Review Architecture, Engineering and Application Development designs and QA / UAT test plans to ensure requirements are met and the RTM is updated as required  Provide BA support for software testing and debugging plans to ensure requirements are met  Provide status reporting for project progress, issues, dependencies and risks  Proactively analyzes and documents solutions Identifies risks/pitfalls and articulates possible options Participates in business strategy & portfolio level discussions Knowledge of the business may be deep in one functional area with broad understanding of other functional areas. Knowledge sharing and mentoring of lower level team members is customary Sphere of relationship and influence is within team, with key stakeholders & with senior management May facilitate meetings ', 'Shift: ', '5+ years’ relevant experience in B2B sales environment.', 'Experience with Agile methodologies.', 'Hands-on experience with CRM / SFA solutions implementation, including design, project planning, and execution.', 'Manage, follow and adhere to the long/short term product roadmap for CRM in conjunction with functional leads.', 'Proactively analyzes and documents solutions', 'Division: ', 'Review Architecture, Engineering and Application Development designs and QA / UAT test plans to ensure requirements are met and the RTM is updated as required ', 'Participates in business strategy & portfolio level discussions', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Information Systems or a related field. MBA a plus.']
