['', ' - Ability to understand, communicate and engage effectively with multiple stakeholders and interactions', ' - Creates acceptance criteria that is clear, concise and actionable', ' - 3-4 years Ecommerce experience', ' - Manages a story backlog to ensure readiness of user stories for the upcoming sprint', ' - Reliable, punctual attendance is an essential function of the position', ' ', ' - Identifies opportunities for improvement across product, process and team', ' - Works with cross functional teams and departments including, but not limited to: data engineering, machine learning and AI, mobile app and web development, digital product owners, etc.', ' - Strong problem-solving, listening, written and verbal communication, and decision-making skills', 'Preferred:', ' - Works with Dev and QA to understand the boundaries of any given story', ' - Works with User Experience (UX) analysts to ensure prototypes convey story intent', 'The Business Analyst will be working with motivated teams on highly visible and valuable customer-facing digital products. This position requires an excellent communicator with outstanding analytical skills, in order to collaborate with business users, technology teams and leadership in an Agile environment.', ' Job Responsibilities:', ' - Analyzes data to ensure features are aligned with product goals/objectives and delivering the most business value', ' - 1-2 years Agile/Scrum experience', 'The Digital organization is seeking a Business Analyst to join the Digital Personalization team. The Senior Business Analyst will work as part of our focused product team transforming business requirements into detailed user stories, in order to deliver best-in-class digital experiences for our customers. This individual will also support the product owner in overall roadmap planning and product strategy.', ' - Translates high level requirements into detailed level requirements (user stories) to be consumed by the development pods in each sprint, while ensuring stories and features are added iteratively to the product to add overall value', ' - Facilitates agile rituals such as inception, iteration and story kickoff, estimation sessions, and help to keep team up-to-date with changes in priorities and to be available to answer questions quickly', ' - Contributes to overall definition of strategy and scope, including working with business stakeholders to understand why we are working on something before development begins', ' Required:', ' - Successful completion of interview required to meet job qualification']

company: New York State Technology Enterprise Corporation (NYSTEC)
job_text: ['', 'Ability to manage and develop key relationships with colleagues and clients through collaborative thinking and a strong customer focus', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Familiarity with health information exchange and/or EHR messaging standards', 'Experience analyzing large data sets, preferably in the healthcare industry (Public Health, Facility, Payer, etc.)', 'About Us:', 'Analyze the quality of various types of healthcare data to elucidate areas of data quality improvement and to aid our clients in any data quality initiatives', 'Ability to query data using SQL and a knowledge of relational database principlesExperience analyzing large data sets, preferably in the healthcare industry (Public Health, Facility, Payer, etc.)Strong communication, documentation, critical thinking, and analytical skillsAbility to manage and develop key relationships with colleagues and clients through collaborative thinking and a strong customer focusAbility to work independently and develop solutions to complex problems as part of a strategic teamMust be proficient with Microsoft Office', 'Ability to synthesize data into client deliverables (Reports, Dashboards, etc.)', 'Strong knowledge of relational database principles', 'If you’re an effective communicator who enjoys working in complex and collaborative environments, utilizing your critical thinking and research skills to develop solutions for clients, providing support to customers, and have the required education, experience and skills, we want to hear from you.', 'Education and Experience', 'As a Data Analyst, you will collaborate with team members to conceptualize, deliver, and support our clients through today’s ever-changing landscape. NYSTEC is considered a trusted advisor, partner of choice and employer of choice. We believe every interaction is an opportunity to deliver exceptional service that empowers client success! Serving as a Data Analyst, your day-to-day role as a NYSTEC consultant will be providing analytical expertise to evaluate healthcare data across various domains and client agencies.\xa0', 'Ability to work independently and develop solutions to complex problems as part of a strategic team', 'About You:', 'NYSTEC is a non-profit technology consulting company, advising agencies, organizations, institutions, and businesses since 1996. We’re independent and vendor-neutral – so we have our clients’ best interests at heart. At NYSTEC, we know that we succeed when individuals and teams flourish personally and professionally, so our benefits and perks support this mindset. Are you ready to contribute to our engaged workforce and deliver the NYSTEC Experience?', 'Required Qualifications', 'Familiarity with clinical data (EHR, Authorizations, etc.)', 'Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future.', 'Assist New York State with high-need analyses related to COVID-19, as needed', 'Proficiency in SQL', '\xa0', 'Fluency in Python (preferably Pandas and NumPy), knowledge of non-relational databases and/or knowledge of JSON', 'Proficiency in SQLStrong knowledge of relational database principlesFluency in Python (preferably Pandas and NumPy), knowledge of non-relational databases and/or knowledge of JSONFamiliarity with national data standards such as HL7, as well as coding systems (LOINC, ICD-10, etc.)Familiarity with health information exchange and/or EHR messaging standardsFamiliarity with clinical data (EHR, Authorizations, etc.)Familiarity with plan and provider data (Claims, Enrollment, Credentialing, etc.)Familiarity with Master Data ManagementStrong proficiency in Microsoft ExcelAbility to synthesize data into client deliverables (Reports, Dashboards, etc.)', 'Learn More About NYSTEC by visiting\xa0www.nystec.com', 'Candidates must\xa0be located within our geographical regions\xa0of\xa0New York City, Albany, or Rome office. We have multiple positions at varying levels.', 'Strong communication, documentation, critical thinking, and analytical skills', 'A minimum of a bachelor’s degree with at least 1 year of related experience in data analysis is required. An equivalent combination of advanced education, training, and experience will be considered. Preference given to candidates with a graduate degree in health informatics, public health, statistics, computer science.\xa0', 'Assess policies, processes, and technical solutions that facilitate the growth of data quality initiatives to inform policy and program decision-makers', '\ufeff', "It is NYSTEC's policy to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all individuals, regardless of actual or perceived race, color, creed, religion, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions), gender identity or gender expression (including transgender status), age, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law, genetic information, military service and veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status, , or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal law and ordinances. NYSTEC is strongly committed to this policy and believes in the concept and spirit of the law.", 'Familiarity with plan and provider data (Claims, Enrollment, Credentialing, etc.)', 'Familiarity with Master Data Management', 'Preferred/Desired Qualifications', 'Analyze the quality of various types of healthcare data to elucidate areas of data quality improvement and to aid our clients in any data quality initiativesAssess policies, processes, and technical solutions that facilitate the growth of data quality initiatives to inform policy and program decision-makersAssist New York State with high-need analyses related to COVID-19, as needed', 'Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel', 'Familiarity with national data standards such as HL7, as well as coding systems (LOINC, ICD-10, etc.)', 'Ability to query data using SQL and a knowledge of relational database principles', 'About the Role:', 'Must be proficient with Microsoft Office']

job_title: CWM - Marcus by Goldman Sachs - Business Controls - Controls Design - Senior Analyst - Richardson, TX
job_text: ['', ' Proactively identify potential business risks, process deficiencies and improvement opportunities and make recommendations for additional controls or to enhance existing control framework to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the risk mitigation program  Gather and synthesize data to define control design requirements to increase the effectiveness of the bank’s job_title: Revenue Forecasting and Analytics - Quantitative Analyst / Data Scientist
job_text: ['', 'Be personable, approachable and able to connect with team members from a variety of backgrounds.', 'Simplify complex problems & huge data sets, to extract non-obvious insights', 'What You’ll Do', 'Spend much of your time programming, including model development and analytics projects using R (Python for some applications if desired) in addition to regularly using spreadsheets for analysis.', 'Develop strong collaborative relationships with key stakeholders in Sales, Finance and across the company, with a specific focus on our Data Science and Forecasting teams', 'Use predictive modeling and analytics to forecast Company’s revenue, identify growth opportunities, influence business partners, and drive effective decision makingSpend much of your time programming, including model development and analytics projects using R (Python for some applications if desired) in addition to regularly using spreadsheets for analysis.Assist in developing appropriately sophisticated models for advertiser demand on timescales ranging from days to years using historical data, explicit manual input, key drivers, and seasonal trends.Develop strong collaborative relationships with key stakeholders in Sales, Finance and across the company, with a specific focus on our Data Science and Forecasting teamsPartner with Product, Engineering and Operations teams to help resolve broader business problems, create revenue growth plans, establish financial and operating targets and determine optimal resource requirementsCreate and deliver impactful presentations that tell a story focused on insights, not just dataDesign, develop & deliver robust and scalable reportingSimplify complex problems & huge data sets, to extract non-obvious insightsBe personable, approachable and able to connect with team members from a variety of backgrounds.', 'Use predictive modeling and analytics to forecast Company’s revenue, identify growth opportunities, influence business partners, and drive effective decision making', 'Assist in developing appropriately sophisticated models for advertiser demand on timescales ranging from days to years using historical data, explicit manual input, key drivers, and seasonal trends.', 'Create and deliver impactful presentations that tell a story focused on insights, not just data', 'Design, develop & deliver robust and scalable reporting', 'Partner with Product, Engineering and Operations teams to help resolve broader business problems, create revenue growth plans, establish financial and operating targets and determine optimal resource requirements']

Will proactively alert stakeholders regarding concerns and assesses the impact of those issues.', 'Engages with and challenges data domain stakeholders and internal teammates to provide CE&I’s perspective on data issues, challenges, and opportunities facing the business and prepares insightful analysis on the impact of those trends.', 'Credible experience working in a fast-moving, client-driven environment.Effective executive-level presentation skills; demonstrated ability to interface with all levels of leadership, as well as teammates at a senior level.Succinct and structured oral and written communications skills with proven ability to explain complex data concepts in a crisp, clear, concise, and graphic-rich style, using appropriate analytics and visualization tools.Prefer experience with Tableau, SQL, SAS, PythonUnderstanding of internal stakeholders and external partners needs and concerns; responds with a sense of urgency.Confident to build a network of internal and external contacts to help shape point of view.Ability to take ownership for delivering customized projects with a high degree of autonomy and manage multiple, highly-complex projects simultaneously.', 'Confident in understanding multiple business drivers and talented at defining the root causes of trends.', 'Prefer experience with Tableau, SQL, SAS, Python', '4. Ability to interpret and explain complex information to a range of senior executive audiences and build consensus among different stakeholders.', 'Consults with the LOBs to agree on data solutions and track/build combined KPIs. \xa0', '6. Experience leading, training, mentoring, and coaching other teammates.', 'The Innovation Data Analyst Lead will be instrumental in building a holistic view of data across the Channel Engineering & Innovation (CE&I) organization. This individual will combine the use of analysis and new techniques to derive insights from unique and ambiguous problems. They will provide industry insight as well as technical and analytical support using data mining, pattern matching, data visualization, and predictive modelling tools to produce analyses and algorithms that help businesses make better decisions. They will fully understand data design, security, quality, and how to leverage business intelligence tools to drive insights.', 'Effective executive-level presentation skills; demonstrated ability to interface with all levels of leadership, as well as teammates at a senior level.', 'Able to bring together a variety of perspectives and sources across the domain to deliver compelling analysis that supports business priorities.', 'PREFERRED SKILLS', 'The right candidate will have the perfect balance of business and technical skills that are required for the successful execution of analytics.\xa0They will work on a diverse range of innovation and multi-disciplinary analytics projects requiring the building of high-impact visuals to provide feedback to clients and finding new ways to express complex scenarios in intuitive and easy to understand ways.\xa0They possess a combination of a sharp analytical mind with hands-on experience in data-mining, ideally in advanced quantitative research, plus a natural gift for communicating and presenting complex analytical findings to stakeholders.', 'Credible experience working in a fast-moving, client-driven environment.', '\xa0', 'Adept at implementing strategically sound analytical methodologies and skilled in coaching less-experienced team members to improve their skills in research, analysis, data analytics, and visualization.', 'The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required.\xa0 Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.', 'Demonstrates ability to use both qualitative and quantitative research and analysis methodologies, including financial analysis skills, to synthesize information, review data inputs, and provide analytic insights.', 'Ensures an outcome-focused approach CE&I data and drives external thought leadership by championing our approach to delivering insights into our labor strategy.', 'Provides deep analytical insight and understanding of Channel Engineering & Innovation, with responsibility for the execution of strategic data initiatives in accordance with Truist Data Standards.', 'Analytical/Decision Making Responsibilities:', '3. Experience managing complex initiatives and projects with material strategic or operational impact to the business in terms of revenue, cost savings, or process improvement.', 'Succinct and structured oral and written communications skills with proven ability to explain complex data concepts in a crisp, clear, concise, and graphic-rich style, using appropriate analytics and visualization tools.', 'Confident to build a network of internal and external contacts to help shape point of view.', 'Ability to synthesize and analyze information coherently and succinctly using the full suite of data analytics and visualization programs, platforms, and tools as appropriate.', 'Skilled in identifying issues and trends emanating in technology and translating those data concept opportunities.', 'Analytical/Decision Making Responsibilities', 'Develops a credible internal data brand as a conduit between our respective LOB partners and the Truist Data Organization to become recognized as a subject matter expert and valued partner to the business.', '5. Advanced executive level communications skills, including persuasion, negotiation, and influence.', 'Understanding of internal stakeholders and external partners needs and concerns; responds with a sense of urgency.', 'Evolves data innovation perspective as a key component of innovation building blocks at Truist.', 'PREFERRED SKILLS – ', 'Develops and co-creates insights beyond what is provided by data teams and evolves available information to build perspective on team, labor, velocity cost.', '2. In-depth knowledge of principles, practices, theories, and/or methodologies associated with the professional discipline assigned (e.g., information technology, project management, finance, risk management, change management, etc.).\xa0 Understand foundational concepts of other related professional disciplines.', "1. Bachelor's degree and eight years of experience or equivalent combination in general business management or consulting, with a wide variety of exposure to senior business executives.", 'MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS - ']

['Experience with media analytics platforms such as Google Marketing Platform, Google Campaign Manager, Facebook, and Adobe.', 'Contribute content and collaborate via the OP-Wiki/Knowledge Base.', 'Strong technical experience regarding data models, databases, data mining, and querying techniques.', 'Participate in OrangePeople monthly team meetings, and participate in team-building efforts.', 'Identify all control points and enable solution working alongside IT technical teams.', 'Self-starter, ability to lead and drive through to resolution with minimal supervision.', 'Intermediate experience in Media or Digital Domain', 'Bachelor s Degree in Business, Marketing, Mathematics, Computer Science or Statistics, with significant quantitative course work is required.', 'Expert at SQL and Alteryx', 'Excellent communication skills required and ability to translate business needs into formal business requirements and functional requirements.', 'Prefer local but open for non-local as well Additional Responsibilities:', 'Ability to effectively communicate and present to management across multiple departments.', 'Provide status reports to OP Account Management as requested About us: Orange People is an Enterprise Architecture and Project Management solutions company. Our most valuable asset is our people: dynamic, creative thinkers, who are passionate about doing quality work. As a member of the Orange People team, you will have access to industry-leading consulting practices, strategies & technologies, innovative training & education. An ideal Orange Person is a technology leader with a proven track record of technical achievements and strong process/methodology orientation.', 'Develop standardized and scalable solutions using various back-end, database, and data transformation tools and technologies (SQL, Alteryx, Spark, etc.) in accordance with best practices.', 'Work closely with technical teams and SMEs to ensure requirements and functional designs are translated accurately into technical designs that meet business needs.', 'Monitor analytics platform and infrastructure performance, and escalate issues with dashboards, predictive models, and ad hoc analysis.', 'Experience with data clean-up work and leading migration of data to new platforms.', 'Contribute to OrangePeople technical discussions, peer reviews, etc.', 'Lead and execute data migration activities for Procurement as we move from Coupa to Ariba as our procure-to-pay system.', 'Strong organizational skills and ability to prioritize and adjust quickly to changing needs.', 'Partner with marketing analysts and others to identify requirements, and transform data for digital analytics and reporting.', 'Lead requirement gathering, documenting business processes and requirements for Procure-to-Pay solution.', 'Lead testing of enhancements delivery and ensure the quality of applications.', 'Overall At least 8 -10 years of experience required', 'Provide business process and system training to end-users.', 'Work with our partners in IT and Accounting/Finance to identify use cases and requirements for the Ariba Procure-to-Pay system.', 'Lead meetings and collaborate with key stakeholders and subject matter experts.', 'Drive and participate in the design and implementation of new enhancements, functionality, and process improvements.', '8 years of experience in SQL and ETL tools like SSIS, Alteryx, Talend, and/or Informatica.', 'Define data flow design and appropriate data models to support ad-hoc analytics needs and assist in the interpretation of data.', 'Act as liaison between technical developers and functional departments.', 'Deep expertise in writing SQL joins stored procedures, scripts, functions, views, indexing, and execution plans.', 'Master s degree (Preferred). ['Microsoft Outlook', 'Salesforce', 'Project planning', "Doctoral degree Full Job Description BioGenerator seeks an engaging and experienced professional to join our BioGenerator Labs team. BioGenerator, the investment arm of BioSTL, produces a sustained pipeline of successful bioscience companies and entrepreneurs in St. Louis by creating, growing and investing in promising new enterprises. BioGenerator's current portfolio is aligned with St. Louis' strengths, including therapeutics, diagnostics, medical devices, agtech, food/nutrition, and health care. This role is critical to the successful operation and future growth of the BioGenerator Labs, an innovation center focused on building successful new St. Louis bioscience companies using resources that include de-risking capital, a national network of KOLs and expert consultants, advanced training in federal non-dilutive grants, innovative laboratory space, and entrepreneurial talent. In this position, you will learn about entrepreneurial challenges and courses of action across a wide range of life-science companies through exposure to many new company ideas, while prioritizing and advancing the most promising new ventures using BioGenerator Labs' resources. You will assist existing and new companies with IP evaluation, business modeling, development planning, resource prioritization, technology de-risking, fund raising, team building, and many other practical business challenges. The position will work closely with the BioGenerator Investment Team in the creation and advancement of new BioGenerator investment portfolio companies. The position will report to the Senior Director, BioGenerator Labs. Note that the BioGenerator Labs is complemented by the BioGenerator Ventures team, which invests in St. Louis bioscience companies. Job Responsibilities: As a member of the BioGenerator team, the position, utilizing scientific, finance, and/or business development experience, will actively participate in the following responsibilities. The available position allows for different degrees of supporting or leadership roles, commensurate with demonstrated experience: Company Building ('BioGenerator Fundamentals and BioGenerator Grants'): Help create and advance promising new St. Louis bioscience companies Source and triage opportunities. Serve as the point of contact with university entrepreneurship programs, e.g., BEC, BALSA, Idea Labs, Med Launch, the Skandalaris Center, and other sources of technology and entrepreneurial talent. Perform scientific and business assessments of new company concepts and early-stage ventures; design milestone-based, go/no go decision funnels on a project-specific basis Identify, engage, and help manage external resources, including consultants, vendors, KOLs, and other resources needed on a project-specific basis Continuously evaluate progress; accelerate projects that achieve milestones Provide feedback and advice to clients on an ongoing basis Evaluate management teams on an ongoing basis; recruit and build teams as necessary to progress new companies to initial funding and beyond Work closely with the BioGenerator Investment Team to advance the most promising concepts for investment consideration by BioGenerator and/or others Federal Grant Center of Excellence ('BioGenerator Grants-2-Business'): Drive increased federal funding to St. Louis bioscience companies Source and triage opportunities Prioritize potential recipients of BioGenerator support Identify, engage, and help manage external resources on a project-specific basis, including consultants, vendors, KOLs, and other resources Program Administration: Maintain a comprehensive monitoring and measurement system for tracking program activities, utilization of resources, and outcomes (primarily via Salesforce) Maintain oversight of all clients to ensure resources engaged in serving clients are on schedule and all resources are efficiently prioritized and deployed Generate reports upon request to BioGenerator or other groups as needed Oversee intake of new clients, coordinating with administrative staff Develop marketing material for program events Perform analyses of program outcomes; propose improvements to processes and areas of focus Maintain regular communications with key stakeholders, e.g., Washington University in St. Louis OTM Qualifications/Experience: PhD in life sciences or equivalent career experience Deep understanding of life science technology with an emphasis on applied and commercial applications Deeply committed to building an inclusive, diverse team and organizational culture Highest personal integrity Strong interest in entrepreneurship required. Prior role in a start-up or related activities preferred Proficiency with the Microsoft Office suite especially Outlook, Word and Excel; working knowledge of SalesForce (or other CRM) is desired including data entry, report generation and basic data analysis Skills: Excellent inquiry, persuasive, collaborative and communication skills, both with internal and external audiences; ability to excel in both a team setting and independently; excellent listener; ability to dissect and understand complex business issues; ability to see the big picture and not get mired in minutia; excellent judgment; prioritization and project planning skills. Application: Please send a detailed letter of interest and resume to with 'Analyst, BioGenerator Labs' in the subject line. Please note that successful applicants must reside in the St. Louis, Missouri region or be willing to immediately relocate to St. Louis. BioSTL is committed to creating an inclusive environment for all members. We seek individuals of diverse backgrounds and experiences who bring diverse perspectives to work. This is an equal employment opportunity. About BioGenerator BioGenerator, the investment arm of BioSTL, produces a sustained pipeline of successful bioscience companies and entrepreneurs in St. Louis by creating, growing and investing in promising new enterprises. About BioSTL Since 2001, BioSTL has laid the foundation for St. Louis' innovation economy with a comprehensive set of transformational programs that advance St. Louis' leadership in solving important world challenges in agriculture, medicine, health care, and other technology areas. BioSTL has introduced nationally-acclaimed initiatives in startup creation and investment (BioGenerator), strategic business attraction (GlobalSTL), physical environment (including Cortex and BioGenerator Labs), entrepreneur support (Fundamentals), seed and venture capital, a diverse and inclusive workforce, and public policy. Apply Now", 'Communication skills', 'Microsoft Excel']
